owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Setelah beberapa hari mencari pilihan tempat menginap untuk perjalanan ke Bali untuk 4 hari 3 malam, saya memutuskan untuk mencoba Seiryu Villas setelah mendapatkan cukup banyak rekomendasi yang baik. Terbukti ini adalah pilihan yang tepat dan saya merekomendasikannya pada semua teman dan pasangan yang hendak menginap di Seminyak.

Para karyawan menerima kami dengan baik, tulus dan dengan sabar menjawab berbagai pertanyaan kami yang agak konyol mengenai reservasi kami. Mereka membantu kami dalam segala hal, mulai dari menyempatkan 20-30 menit untuk membantu menyusun rencana harian kami, menghubungi restoran dan tur pilihan kami untuk membuat reservasi, hingga beragam tips dan trik yang diberikan agar kami benar-benar menikmati perjalanan kami. Seperti pengakuan para tamu yang lain, kami pun merasa seakan-akan kami lah satu-satunya tamu di resort ini dan mendapatkan pengalaman benar-benar unik, semua karyawan mengetahui detail kegiatan kami dan setiap hari menanyakan bagaimana pengalaman kami melakukan aktivitas tertentu keesokan harinya. Pengalaman yang didapatkan setara dengan yang didapatkan di franchise hotel bintang 5 atau 6 berstatus elit di kota-kota besar dengan harga 2-3 kali lebih mahal.

Vilanya sangat bagus, luas, bersih, nyaman, persis dengan foto-fotonya. Kami sempat terganggu oleh nyamuk selama beberapa jam di malam pertama, namun setelah itu nyamuk-nyamuk tersebut hilang dengan sendirinya. Kolam renangnya cukup bagus untuk sekedar berendam dan bersantai, wi-fi cukup kencang untuk melakukan email/chat/Facebook dan sebagainya dengan lancar. Area luar ruangan sangat fantastis terutama jika Anda memilih makan malam BBQ yang dihidangkan dengan sangat baik, benar-benar sepadan dengan harganya. Tidak ada keluhan apapun  tentang vila dan kelengkapan sarananya, bahkan melebihi yang diharapkan.

Makanan juga lumayan meski tidak istimewa. Terdapat empat pilihan sarapan dengan beragam pilihan. Beberapa menu cukup lezat (saya menyukai french toast-nya) namun kelebihan utamanya memang pada cara penyajian dan variasi pilihannya.

Ketika check-out seluruh karyawan hadir untuk mengucapkan selamat jalan, sungguh mengharukan dan mereka tampak sangat tulus. Kami pasti akan kembali jika menetap lagi di Bali!
title: Pengalaman menetap yang fantastis di Seiryu Villas

text: Kami menetap di sini untuk berbulan madu. Serasa di surga. Tempatnya sungguh syahdu dan mengesankan. Para karyawan tidak menarik perhatian namun sangat proaktif. Semua begitu sempurna. Kami mendapatkan makan malam di pinggir kolam renang dengan diterangi cahaya ratusan lilin. Dunia serasa milik berdua namun dengan kenyamanan memiliki pelayan pribadi. Mereka juga menyediakan layanan kendaraan lengkap dengan supir yang sangat ramah dan membantu. Kami mencintai sarapan gaya Jepang yang disajikan dalam kamar kami. Kami menikmati pengalaman kami menetap di hotel ini. Saya merekomendasikan hotel ini untuk bulan madu anda.
title: Perjalanan di Surga

text:
kami pergi ke bali pada bulan feb 2011 dan menginap di seiryu selama 3hari 2malam. kami dijemput di bandara dengan ontime dan pelayanan yang baik selama perjalanan menuju villa. kami diberitahu lokasi yang bagus untuk dikunjungi.seperti guide tour singkat. 
review saya untuk villa ini:
-private pool yang sangat bagus. terdapat gazebo disisi kiri pool untuk bersantai
-bathroom dengan bathtub yang dilengkapi jacuzzi dan pintu tembus ke pool
-kamar yang luas dengan lcd tv dan dvd player
- ruang dapur yang bersih dan nyaman dilengkapi microwave dan coffee maker, serta kulkas dan kompor beserta peralatan masak
-meja makan yang simple
-living room dilengkapi lcd tv 42" dan dvd player.
-suasana villa yang teduh dan menyenangkan
kami juga mendapatkan fasilitas pinjaman sepeda motor selama di villa. selain itu, setiap kami berpergian, sekembalinya ke hotel villa kami sudah bersih. romantic dinner dipinggir pool juga sangat mengesankan

kesimpulan:perfect! :)

text: I stayed at The Seiryu on a work trip—and I was completely blown away! The ambiance of the villa was the perfect work/life balance that I definitely needed. I enjoyed all of the amenities the villa offered along with their convenient and safe transportation services (which I definitely took advantage of!) My favorite was probably The Seiryu Spa because I didn’t have to leave the comfort of my room—they came to me! Talk about total convenience and treating your guest to the ultimate experience! Overall, The Seiryu Villas get a 10/10 in my book! From the room accommodations, to the food and amenities, my experience here is one of the reasons why I will return to Bali!

text:
I just came back from The Seiryu Villas and absolutely loved it!!

It's about a 5 minute walk to Double Six Beach ask the Butler they'll be more than glad to give you directions!

The decor is Japanese inspired, the lobby is very pleasing and welcoming! 

The villa is very comfortable and spacious for 2. Never had a problem with mosquitoes for the first time in 4 trips to Bali. 

The breakfast smoothie bowl with peanut butter is a delight! 

The bed is comfortable and they have a movie box in the living room with sufficient movie options. The pool is enough for relaxing in the sun.  

Its wonderful, I'd definitely recommend friends!
title: I loved it!

text: Giving it a second star because of the staff and the nice breakfast. Checked in here at midnight and walked into a flat that was 30 degrees C. Given the spaciousness of the villa and in which one cannot close off rooms, the high ceilings and the mini split a/c's being old, cooling the place down is a major process. 2 hours post check in the temp had dropped to 28 C. Needless to say, I got very little if anything in the way of sleep, this for about 9,600 PHP. The manager responded by stating 23 to 25 was standard however I did take a photo showing the 83 (28.3 C) and sent it off to him. Crickets. If you are going to sell rooms, especially at that level, bring them up to standards upon check in.
title: Slept in a sauna

text: There are A LOT of places to chose from in Bali.  I loved this Seiryu because it was small, walking distance to the shops, bars, and restaurants, and off the main road - so it was very quiet and peaceful!  The private pool is PRIVATE and the room is HUGE and very comfortable.  The staff is extremely friendly, which made the stay even better.  I would like to recognize Ira, who worked most of the time during my short stay.  She recommended a nice place to eat, La Favela, as well as many other places we did not get a chance to visit, so I guess I need to come back!  Ira was also the "butler" for the in-room dinner, and she was amazing.  It was also nice to talk with her about Bali and her travels around the world.  Everything we needed was just a phone call away, the service and the room were excellent.  Thank you, Ira and Seiryu Villas for making my first Christmas away from my family amazing and an experience to remember.
title: Awesome Villa

text:
Just returned from our first trip to Bali. We booked this villa based on recommendations and were not disappointed. You can believe all the wonderful reviews about The Seiryu. 

The property is intimate with just 8 villas and is situated in the centre of Seminyak, 5 mins walk to the beach and easy access to everything. 

The villa was beautiful, spacious, comfortable, very private and had everything we needed. We had a package that included some meals and massage, which was amazing! The Indonesian breakfast was a delicious way to start each day, but there are other choices too.  Dinner meals were lovely as well. 

The staff at The Seiryu are absolutely first class. Very attentive, engaging, friendly, professional and responsive to our every need or request. They made our stay in Bali perfect. We ended up feeling like family. And even though we were not, they had a special way of making us feel as if we were the only ones there. They go out of their way to make sure your stay in Bali is everything you hope for and more. 

Fantastic restaurants of all budgets are close by and there is shopping all around. An easy walk or a $1-2 taxi ride to Seminyak Square, and a 25 min walk or $3-4 taxi to Potato Head. 

We will stay here again in a heartbeat and highly recommend The Seiryu to everyone.
title: Excellent!!

text:
My wife and I really enjoyed your lovely villa and your very helpful staff. Repeat visitors to Bali will understand how hectic areas like Seminyak can be. The Seiryu Villas provide a very tranquil and appreciated escape from all the hustle and bustle. We stayed in the Royal Villa and enjoyed it so much we really hated to leave. My wife is Balinese and we really enjoyed having the room to entertain some of her family in our spacious villa.
I would really like to Thank Ira, a lovely young lady from the front desk who told us to make due as if we were in our own home. Ira and the other girls were always available to assist us with whatever we requested. The food was very delicious and cooked in a Balinese style and was very affordable.
As far as improvements I feel I am nit-picking but a mosquito net over the bed would be nice and better coffee selection (ie cappuccino/expresso)....for visiting Canadian caffiene addicts like myself.
We have found a new home in Seminyak and eagerly await our next stay at the Seiryu Villa.

Sincerely Bryan and Iluh Landry 

PS There is a great spa right next door for all your pampering needs.

text:
My partner and I stayed at the Seiryu in early September to unwind from a intense but awesome tour of Vietnam.
From the moment we walked in we were blown away by the Japanese influence and stylish front garden. A sense of zen starts to fill you with the visual art and fixtures of the building .
We were greeted by arguably the best staff we have ever encountered ( travelled the world and stayed in Bali 9 x times in a lot of Villas , W Resort etc ..)
The team here are our new extended family now ! Everyone is warm and friendly like the Balinese but the Seiryu family are what made this trip extra memorable .
For example I asked Turah our butler about motorbike hire to which he recomended some pricing and ideas then drove me around Seminyak to find the newest bike with the best rate - he got no cut on this and we had an awesome conversation on the trip around town, spitting funny stories about our families and recent endeavours .
Now the Villa itself was beautiful and quiet , you first walk in and see the manicured garden, beautiful pool with water fountain, chilling bungalow, outside shower to wash the sparkling volcanic sand from the beach located 10 minutes away ( sunbaking time from 11am to 4pm approx) sunbaking longue chairs and a clothes rack to dry your swim wear 
Step inside and find a nice big lounge with big TV and DVD player ( they had a set top box loaded with 500 current movies for us ) . The bath and shower are neiboured by the pool so you can have a nice bath while looking straight into the pool ( good for keeping an eye on the kids). The beautiful king size bed is comfortable with another tv and DVD player with bedside lighting and telephone to call front desk for all your wants and needs . The seperate kitchen is fully equipped to make your own foods ( but really would you with all the awesome affordable food Seiryu can prepare and surrounding restaurants? Lol ) Our daily custom breakfasts were delivered through the back into this room without a peep and was such a surprise the first time we had our awesome breakfast .
Sunburnt ? No worries add 3x split system air conditioners so you can really get the place super chilly if required 
We stayed for 10 days and had friends and other family staying 40 steps away at the Marriot to which they came over to watch movies with us and swim in the pool ( all initially encouraged by the Seiryu staff)
I also had my 40th birthday there to which 10 staff members brought me the most delicious choclate cake and sung me birthday wishes to which I went as red as my sunburn with embarrassment! 
There are more  amazing things to discuss about Seiryu but you need to discover them for yourself and book your own honeymoon , family trip or getaway here . 
See you next year Seiryu
title: Class from start to finish. Style and value for money

text:
First impression was when we had to bring forward our trip! The butler who answered my call (on a weekend) promptly passed our request to reservation team on the next working day without me having to call them again. 👍
Purpose of trip is for rest & relax only. So we decided to lock ourselves in a villa and Seiryu villa was just right! We stayed in the Royal Villa. 
Very spacious, almost too big for two people. Private pool size was just right. Comfortable bed, comfortable day bed/sofa to laze in and watch the in-house movies provided. The gazebo by the pool was comfy. Surprisingly windy though we are closed off from the road side. You get full privacy.
Breakfast served in villa promptly as requested and was good enough for us where we specially requested for halal food option. We also liked that we don't have to boil hot water ourselves. Just take from the water dispenser. 
Toilet was too dim and probably need to refurbish the shower area as it was hard to switch rain shower head modes. Bathtub/jacuzzi also showing age. Shower gel and shampoo bottle was too big. Wondering if every new guest gets a new set or the bottle just gets topped up after every guest? Not the type i would use.
A wall clock in the kitchen or living room would be a good addition.
title: Rest & relax

text:
We stayed in the villas for almost a week recently and really enjoyed the small boutique feel of the hotel - there are only 8 units and as a result, the staff really gets to know you and pays attention to you.  They were very nice - very friendly - excellent service.  They were helpful with organizing a driver and tours for us. 

The villa is a great size - full kitchen and living area, nice outdoor seating area, pool.  They bring in breakfast in the morning, which we selected at night (however, we had to make it a point to remember to stop by the front desk to order, which we'd forget, I'm not sure why they didn't just leave the sheet in your room to order).  The best part about this place though, was the location.  It is a 10 minute walk to the beach, there are great restaurants all around (the Koop for breakfast when we tired of the options there, Wacko burger, lots of little bars and options along the beach and just up the street).  There is a convenience store two doors down and just next to that, a place for really inexpensive (and clean!) massages.  

The only reason this didn't get 5 stars is that it looks like it could use an update.  Everything looks a little dated.  There were stains on some of the furniture, scuff marks on the walls, and the shower wouldn't drain.
title: Beautiful villa

text:
For the six nights we thoroughly enjoyed our stay in villa A1. It was a pleasure meeting Widi and his staff who looked after us during our entire stay. A special thank you to Mini and all the staff who put together a memorable setting for a 30th birthday party and the cake was a lovely touch. All staff including the guards deserve to be commended for their warm and meticulous service. As there are only 8 villas, we always felt welcomed and greeted.

The street where this villa is located is now booming with new hotels, restaurants and cafes. Seminyak beach is within a 10min walk for those lovely walks in the morning or during sunset.

The villa allocated to us was exactly what we needed. The pool was great which we made good use to cool off after soaking the afternoon heat. 
The only negative we found in our room was the condition of the bathroom. It is in dire need of a renovation and most of the reviews here are accurate of this condition. The towels and bath mats were in very poor condition (stains etc).

Overall the service and location made our stay here an excellent one.

text:
Its my 4th time to Bali,always stay at villas,you cant go back to normal hotel after you was stayed at Bali villas because of high privacy and space.
Booked this hotel by my agent ,stayed 5 nights here,room rate less than Usd 200 per nite,if you wanna get a cheaper rates,I think you really need to book few months in advance.
This villas is just located behind courtyards bali,just 2~3 mins walk,you can find a lots of restaurants.Restaurants mainly serving western food with a lots of selections and very reasonable price.
24 hrs Convenience store just next to this villas.And  groceries store few minutes walk.
This villas is huge,we stayed at Royal villas,its about 190m2 or 1900 ft.its equipped with open kitchen,microwave,pool is big compared to other small villas.please kindly refer to my uploaded photos.
A la carte Breakfast also served to our room,even its a la carte menu,it had a good selections,food quality is most important,I may say that is the best breakfast I ever eat in Bali villas(of cause cant compare to 5 stars buffet breakfast).
Privacy of this villas is very high.There is no high buildings around this villas,total 8 villas,all facing same directions,and its really quite.
Interior design is very modern.Bathroom with shower and jacucci.
Bedroom is big,bed also huge,can sleep at least 4 adults on the bed.
Staff are very nice and helpful.
Definitely wanna come back again.
I love Bali.
Just 1 comment giving to the villas management,cause there is a back door for the staff to serve the breakfast in the morning,they said they will call before serving the breakfast to our room,but the first 2 days,they just knocked on the door and enter the villas,its a bit embarrassed that someone enter your villas without permission.Anyway,maybe they are busy during peak hours,other than that everything is prefect!
5 stars!
title: Nice villas

text:
When we were searching for our hotel in Seminyak and saw the Seiryu Villas - it was decided on that heartbeat that we would stay here. 
Check in was so smooth and staff came with us to introduce the villa and its functions. 
The garden and pool area is so beautiful that I couldn't almost believe my eyes. We spent so much time there relaxing and swimming!
And the villa was even more stunning than in the pictures, I said multiple times during our holiday that I do not want to ever leave and just stay living here!
The hotel staff was absolutely kind and caring, they even helped us to find a special souvenir that we already had seen somewhere else, but couldn't find anymore. And they also arranged a driver for us, so we could see Uluwatu and Jimbaran areas. Although the driver coulnd't speak English very well.
We loved the harmony and public areas of the hotel and we didn't hear any noise from other villas.

Our bedroom was facing the area where staff will pass by when coming to prepare your breakfasts and I must say we woke up many mornings to very loud talk from there. It felt like there was zero sound proofing on the tiny windows or on the walls.
Breakfast was good, but there were a little sloppiness about the orders. One day we both got wrong juices and another day mine was different than ordered. This happened few times during our holiday, but it didn't bother us so much. We ordered few times from the in room dining menu, the food was pretty good but it took a bit too long to arrive. 
Also remember to say when checking in if you don't want any calls, because then if you don't say it - there will be A LOT of calls.

Overall we enjoyed our stay very much! The luxury of having a private Japanese style minimalistic villa with superb garden/pool area was the crown to our holiday!
title: The absolute way to crown our holiday!

Overall we really enjoyed stay here for 4 nights.

text:
Our stay at Seiryu Villas was slightly disappointing.

The villas are relatively old and not very well taken care of. Some doors in the villa did not close properly and it took time to get it fixed. The sunshade did not close and the pool area was very hot as there wasn't any air circulation due to the high walls around. 
The breakfast was okay but not amazing and we would have expected more diversity. 
There is also no onsite spa but that isn't a huge issue due the large number of spas available in Seminyak.
Had I been on my honeymoon, I would have been disappointed by the overall stay.

On the positive side, the service was friendly.

For the price that they ask if not booked well in advance there should be better options. My main lesson is not to rely too much on other overly positive reviews on the internet.
title: Disappointing

text:
I think the sign of a great hotel (accommodation) is how they handle problems. Let's face it stuff happens which is beyond their control. So when I was told my room would not be ready until 10pm (at 6.30pm) you can imagine I was not happy. However the staff were honest, polite apologetic and made what I felt was appropriate compensation. So I was happy!  That's a job well done.

The villa itself is gorgeous and I'm sad to say bigger than my apartment in Hong Kong. Very Balinese style so easy open living, lots of light and shade and organic (wood).

The only negative (and I'm being picky) is that the technology needs updating (new TV, Bluetooth sound system, docking station for iPhone 5/6) and the aircon was directly over the bed. I couldn't seem to find a sleep mode or a way to have it so it didn't blow cold air directly on me. I managed to overcome this by switching it off and running the aircon in the living space - it worked well enough.

Would recommend to a friend and would stay there again if back to Bali
title: Relaxing and walking distance to the action

text: Love The Seiryu Villas. We've stayed at a number of villa properties around Bali, but this place feels like home. Many properties have an outdoor living room but we've found this is inconvenient in the evening when the mosquitos are out. All the villas here (large and small - we've stayed in both) have indoor living rooms which is great for evening chilling. The bed areas all have TVs as well. Another plus is the lounge area next to the villa pool and the entrance from the bathroom into the pool - fun! They recently discontinued their beach chairs at the beach (5 minute walk away) which is a bummer, but beach chairs are cheap to rent for the day. We love surfing (or attempting to surf) at the nearby beach. Next door is Spa Bali - which has great massage packages and masseuses. It's walking distance to many shops and restaurants. What more can I say? We're big fans. Be back next summer.
title: Our Yearly Bali Home

text:
I stayed in this villa for 3 nights. My Husband and I visit Bali yearly, and in terms of accommodation and food (breakfast and room service), the villa did not disappoint. The villa is spacious and clean, and staff are very polite and efficient.
This would have been a 4.5 star review, if not for one thing.

After leaving Bali, and upon arrival in our home country, my Husband received an email from the villa, stating that they have missed out charges and have charged the dropped charges to our credit card. We have furnished our card details via a charge form prior to arrival in Bali to secure the villa.

We acknowledged the dropped charges, however we were not so pleased with the villa charging to the card first before informing us or asking us for approval/ verification. 

We felt unsettled with their action (and will probably get a card replacement from the bank after the charges have been settled) and hope that in future, they could inform the guests on the charges before doing the actual charge on the card.

All in all, it has been a pleasant stay with seiryu villa which did not quite end on a pleasant note.

text:
I only have amazing feedback for this villa resort walking distance to the Seminyak beach. I was in B2 for two nights and the villa has a fantastic design. From the moment you want into the complex you feel this amazing energy. I was shown my private pool villa and was pleasantly pleased with the sheer size and design. 

The villas have polished wooden floorboards and high ceilings with a chandelier. Everything down to the lighting was perfect and the villa was incredibly quiet.

The bed was super comfortable and everything for me from the ensuite bathroom to being able to jump into the pool from a door in the bathroom was impressive. 

I inspect many villas and this is one of my favourites in Seminyak. It's walking distance to everything - shops, bars, restaurants and the beach. Plus there is a fantastic Italian restaurant 2 doors up that I recommend trying.

One other point is the internet. Super fast and that's a bonus for those coming to Bali that need to be online too. So if you need to work whilst away then this is a no brainer!
title: Everything and more!

text:
It was one of our most enjoyable stays. The staff are great, friendly and really helpful. The villa (A4 in our case) was in great condition. The pool is awesome. The location is perfect, close to everything and very quite at the same time. Wifi was flawless. Only three comments: 

1- the waterfall is noisy and should be only turned on upon request. 

2- the room cannot be blacked out. Particularly annoying if you are jetlagged. As soon as the sun rises, the room is as bright as the outside. 

3- the butler delivers the breakfast to your kitchen at your villa (which has a backdoor) every morning but they insist on waking you up.

Other than those comments, our stay was enjoyable and the staff were very attentive.
title: Almost perfect!

text: My boyfriend and I stayed at The Seiryu Villas for 5 nights. We had an absolute great time there. The villa was large, bed was extremely comfortable, wifi was very fast, the villa was always clean and air-conditioning was also very good. The staff at the Villa were beyond fantastic, so helpful and friendly all of the time. I have nothing bad to say about this place, having only 8 villas you really get a friendly feel there and the staff always recognise you it's a nice home away from home. Will definitely be staying here again on our next visit to Bali.
title: Fantastic Villa and Staff!

text: We stayed in Seiryu Villas in late June. The villa was of the right size and has everything needed to make the trip a memorable one. We couldn't have breakfast for the first two mornings as we were leaving very early for our activities and they packed for us breakfast boxes! We finally got to try the breakfast on the third morning and what a spread! Ordered the BBQ in our room and when we came back in the evening, the villa was decorated very romantically and the food were very nice too! The pool was also great after a hot day out. Staffs were extremely friendly. The villa was near the beach, within walking distance and close to all the shops and restaurants too! Would definitely stay here again!
title: Great villa with very friendly staffs!

text:
I have to give credit to the developer especially the architect! The design of the villa was practically flawless with every aspects of the premise undergoing detailed thought processes. The lighting, the location and the arrangement, internally and externally. 

This was my fourth visit in Bali and the first time with my wife. The villa served it purposes. It was private, romantic and sweet and we spent a lot more time at the villa rather than outside at the Seminyak beach.

Highly accessible to spa (next door), shopping districts, about 5 minutes walk Seminyak beach and definitely no issue with overcrowding as prevalent in Kuta. 
Generally the services provided was excellent and we cannot think of anything bad that is worth mentioning. 

This was definitely a good choice, and I would say it was worth every single penny.
title: Private, Romantic and Sweet

text:
Due to our plan, we only stayed in the villa for one night, and we simply could not enjoy enough! 

It is very quiet and private, the interior and the furniture made us feel at home and relaxed. We wish we could have the similar in our real home! 

The staff are invisible -they almost never appear unless you need them, but when you realize, they have got everything ready, incredible! 

The breakfast is also very delicious!

The villa is 10 minutes walk from the beach, which we enjoyed the sunset very much!

Definitely recommended for couples!

text:
On arrival we were sat in the waiting room and could hear very loud building work going on next door. I appreciate there is little the hotel could do about this but it wasn't what we were expecting given the price of the villa. Once we got inside the villa, it was much better but noise from other building work could still be heard. 

The villa was beautifully presented and decorated and the private pool was great (as was the jacuzzi bath). 

The bathroom had a slightly stale smell so we had to keep venting it. Again not what you expect from this calibre of accommodation. 

The breakfast was poor, it was often cold and the croissants tasted like they'd been microwaved. 

The villa itself was good and the service was very friendly and helpful but we stayed about 4 other locations in Bali (all of equal or under the price of this) and all of the others far exceeded the level of quality.
title: Incredible villa, spolied by surroundings

owner_response.text:
Dear rneary1

thank you very much for your review and we do apologize for the inconvenience while your stay at Seiryu villa especially for the next door construction.
also we are glad to hear that you are enjoyed the villa however we very sorry for the breakfast quality not like your are expected.
we will do our best to increase our service and once again thank you very much for your positive comment.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed there for four days. As the temperate was most of the time around 26, it was a bit cold for us to dip in the swimming pool, what a pity. 

The A4 room was very spacious for us already. Cannot imagine for B1 and B2 that quite a few recommended, how bigger it will be. The staff were very friendly and helpful in all our requests including helping to book an automatic car (most agencies offered manual cars).

Room was maintained very clean however it was a seven-year-old room that a lot of signs showed the age. The yellow watermarks in the bathtub somehow spoilt the mood. The bed sheet, even after changing into clean one, was already yellowish. It was very advisable if owner will consider do some simple redecoration, the villa can live up to the price better. 

Lastly the food was really not so good after we tried the breakfast. However in Bali with all the cheap seafood by the Jimbaran beach, why consider eating in the villa?
title: Clean and spacious layout but a redecoration will be better

text:
The hotel facilities is generally good. The room is comfortable with good lightings and layout. Furniture is practical and zen-like. Location is good as well as tends to relatively near to the beach.

Some improvements required include:
1. quality of in-room service food need to be improved especially dinner (breakfast is ok)
2. some refurbishment and renovation may be due in near future as can be seen from worn out paint finishes and scratched floors. 
3. Cleanliness to be improved in terms of cleaning up algae around pool area, etc. 
4. The bed mattress is too soft for personal taste
5. Staff needs to be improve in their knowledge of nearby places and/or to provide map for ease of moving about.
title: Great hotel with reasonably good facilities

text: Stayed here for 4 nights. The villa is quite spacious as we stayed at the royal pool villa. Pool is too small but still ok. Kitchen was ok but I wish they have more utensils, but compare to other villas thay I have stayed theirs considered 7-8 in 10 scale. The bath room has a bad odour in the shower (people please dont pee in the shower!!), but after we complained they managed to fix it. Breakfast was ok, but I wish they can be more flexible on what we can order because we were with our kids and to have more option is always better. Good location as you can easily get good food and shops are nearby. Currently in front of the villa there's shop house construction and it gets quite noisy and dusty, hope they can finish that soon. Service is good as they will listen to your complain and do something about it. They dont have extra bed but their sofa at the living room can be used is needed. Towel needs to be replaced as it looks rotten and yellowish.

text:
The Seiryu Villa's offer a couple the prefect place to relax after a busy period in your life. The rooms offer the right amount of space with a kitchenette, beautiful dining area, spacious lounge area, and a bed you have to roll over 4 times to actually touch your partner :)

The amenities are clean and spacious with a large shower, spa bath and outdoor lap pool with a beautiful water wall! 
There are 2 areas to relax outdoors and a beautiful frangipani tree in the corner. 

The management and staff are friendly, professional and are happy to help with anything! 

Food is brought to the villa and all staff are respectful and a pleasure, setting up meals, clearing dishes and not letting you lift a finger! 

I hughly recommend The Seiryu Villa's!
title: Honeymoon Bliss

text: These villas are beautifully designed, conveniently located to the beach, shopping, and restaurants. Stayed here for one week of honeymoon over New Years - which is a crazy time in Seminyak. Our villa allowed us to escape the madness outside and relax in luxury and style. I loved the private pool in particular, spent a lot of time in it! The villas are very private and secluded, you could easily forget that there are others anywhere near by! The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful - they cannot do enough for you. The food is great - a good breakfast is served to you every morning in your villa - and we ended up having dinner through room service 3 nights because the food was so good. Try the Balinese BBQ in your villa - the seafood is incredible, the whole evening is a great experience. If we ever go back to that part of Bali, we would definitely return to Seiryu, we enjoyed everything about it.
title: Quiet oasis in the middle of busy Seminyak

text: If you are like me, you are overwhelmed right now with the choices of lodging in Bali and even which destination is right for you. There is an absurd amount of hotels and you don't want to pick the wrong one! Hotel or Villa, private pool or save some money? We decided to go all out with our stay in Seminyak and then have a slightly different experience in Ubud which turned out to be perfect.This was our first ever Villa experience. Having a little private oasis in Seminyak was great to get away from the hassle on the beaches. Let alone, your own private pool since we didn't even go in the very large waved and slightly dirty ocean water. The staff was friendly and helpful and the Villas were fantastic. There was so much space for just the two of us! We stayed in the Villa that was all the way down the long outdoor corridor. The Villas were private, quiet, clean and decorated beautifully. The pool water was a little bit chilly to spend a lot of time in but you could fill up the jet tub to warm up in after. Breakfast was spectacular every morning with all the different choices of ethic breakfasts. We tried them all. We didn't realize until the last day we were there that the Villa offered free beach chairs and umbrellas a few yards down the beach. The staff was very helpful and accommodated drivers to take us to the local temples. The beach was a short walk away and the Villa was close to many great restaurants and little shops. I would highly recommend staying here to anyone who has this narrowed down on their list!
title: Wonderful Luxury

text:
We went as a couple for Christmas for a week. We stayed in Royal Villa B2 and it was absolutely beautiful.

The staff were excellent from the minute that we got picked up at the airport. The daily breakfast was very good and you could customise it every day. The staff went above and beyond constantly and were always extremely friendly and helpful. Each day the villa was cleaned top to bottom.

The location is great, near bars and restaurants and also near the beach. It is a very short taxi ride (or shuttle) to the main strip in Seminyak but is in a lovely quiet location. Each time we walked into the villa we felt very relaxed - it was like our own sanctuary!

Would definitely recommend and come back again! It really was the perfect getaway for a couple.
Thanks for a great stay!

text:
Very memorable 5 days spent at the villa! Our first time in Bali and our first stop too.

Staff were easy going and always full of smiles - the personal touch and thoughtfulness made us feel welcome and at home.Great service to all!

Very impressed by the villa's Zen style design and decor - we got to relax and unwind in abundance of living space and minimalism.

Kitchen very well equipped and a drinking water dispenser was indeed a pleasant surprise. Bed was spacious (super-king) and comfy. The hair dryer was more powerful than those found in typical hotels.

Many movies titles to entertain ourselves with in the comfort of the sofa.The 1.2 meter pool is just right to swim and cool ourselves in a midst the hot weather. The direct connection from the pool to the bathroom is very thoughtful. The outdoor garden and bamboos added the extra tranquility to our stay. Not to mention the generous serving for the breakfast. Villa is conveniently located within walking distance from main Seminyak road (shopping belt) and the beach.

Seiryu exceeded our expectations in many ways. Highly recommended for holidayers looking to chill out in peace and quiet and who welcome occasional hustle and bustle at shopping belt/beach nearby. 

We look forward to staying in Seiryu again in our next holiday to Bali.

(Couple at Seiryu from 8th Nov to 12th Nov 2014)
title: A big thank you for the warm hospitality!

text:
We spent 9 nights at The Seiryu Villas and it was perfect. The staff are so professional and friendly and always went out of their way to help.
The villa is huge and has everything you need for your stay.
The private pool is a perfect size for a couple.
There is plenty of sun between 9am and 4pm on the lounges and the outside shower is useful also.
The bed is SO comfortable! We slept so well our entire holiday!
The breakfast is great too. Plenty of options and cooked perfectly every morning.
We loved that they brought the breakfast through the back door and set it up in the kitchen at our desired time. The French toast is AMAZING!
We also enjoyed a set lunch and candlelit dinner during our stay and both were delicious.
The location is great. A short stroll to the beach and plenty of restaurants around to choose from. 

We would highly recommend these villas for couples and honeymooners!

text:
My last stop in Bali was Seminyak and I'm glad I chose this villa. 
The minute I walked in, I felt the serenity, a big contrast with the hustle and bustle of Seminyak. 
The Japanese style is very soothing and you don't see too many staff running around, which I liked.
Of all the places I stayed, the staff was genuinely friendly here. 

The villa is amazing. Nice size pool, very private and spacious. There is a fully equipped kitchen which I think most people probably might not use. 
The lay out of the villa is well thought out. It was nice to just sit in the garden, swim and just chill out on the chair or gazebo.

The staff was really discreet. Breakfast was brought trough the back in the kitchen. 

Cons
Perhaps it was only the case in room A1, but the bathroom fixtures could use an update.
Some tiles in the pool and drains might need to be changed. An overall upgrade to the villa is due.

Pros
Walking distance from the beach. 
Lot's of restaurants and shops nearby.
Villa is spacious and feels really private.
Japanese breakfast was nice. The other meals were so so.
Free wifi in the villa.

If I ever find myself in Seminyak, I would definitely consider The Seiryu.
title: Spacious and private

text: We loved out 6 nights at the Seiryu. Travelling in July is a busy time of year and the villas felt like our own private escape haven from the hustle and bustle. The villas are in a great location - close to the beach and we felt very safe and secure. The rooms were stunning with the private pool villas and the room facilities exceeded expectations. The decor was very modern yet felt very Balinese and the rooms were very clean, light and well maintained. Staff were very friendly and though some struggled a little with English there was always someone else to ask. The only change I would recommend is more versatility with the breakfast options. Overall a beautiful experience and would highly recommend to all. Also I lost my mobile phone during this trip and the manager was so unbelievably helpful and went out of his way beyond belief... he even tried to help us retrace our steps by personally going to the shops we had visited one afternoon in order to try and locate my mobile phone! Yes the phone was found! Stunning, modern, clean and bright. Highly recommend and look forward to returning : )
title: Beautiful accommodation- location, value, service and over all feel.

text: We had a wonderful week at the Seiryu Villas. The weather wasn't that great but it didn't dampen our holiday. We stayed in B4 - which I think is the slightly smaller of the villas with pools but was still really spacious. Was so nice to wake up every morning to breakfast being delivered to your own kitchen. The sun shined from 9.30 - 4.30.  Is located about a ten minute walk from the shops. Taxi's are pretty cheap to get around town. Staff were fantastic - so helpful and always had a smile. Would definitely return!!
title: Excellent service - So Relaxing

text: The villas at this property were absolutely amazing! Our villa was over the top awesome in every way.  It was large, clean, comfortable - had everything that we would have had at home and even more. All the amenities worked fantastic - especially loved how cool the villa was with the air conditioner - great escape from the humidity.  The bed was soooo comfortable - we never had a bad nights sleep in eight nights there!  It was quiet and a very peaceful break away from the craziness in the Seminyak area.  The layout of the villas with a pool right outside your bathroom (literally you step in the water outside your door) was heavenly.  You could take a bath in the huge whirlpool tub and then jump in the warm pool water - luxury!!!  Everything in the villa was high end and fully stocked - you wanted for nothing and if you forgot some toiletry from home - they had it!!!    The villas really are only about 5 minutes from the beach and it is a relatively easy walk. We never needed to take a cab anywhere while we stayed there.  There are literally dozens of restaurants everywhere and we definitely found our favorites.  The breakfasts we were served in the morning were awesome - huge selection - highly recommend the french toast or pancakes - just awesome!  The service at the villas was amazing as well - the staff took care of every request very quickly and were extremely thorough. We had a problem with an event booking and the manager immediately addressed it with the company and got our money back - that was terrific service!   I can not recommend this place highly enough - it was everything we could have hoped for and well beyond our dreams for an oasis retreat!
title: One of the best retreat villas ever!!!

text: We have just spent 10 days at the Seiryu and loved it. The hotel staff were SO helpful and accomodating and they made our trip what it was! We will absolutely stay here again when we head back to Bali!

text: My husband and I have just spent 10 days in this beautiful and relaxing villa.  We were so happy to have booked our holiday here.  The villa was so comfortable and we loved having a lovely space to enjoy our stay.  The staff were exceptional and we really liked the location. text: Stayed at the Seiryu Villas in March 2014, was a fantastic break away when you entered  your villa it was like you were in your own world.  The service was fantastic.  Perfect for a honeymoon, quite get away, or to have a romantic holiday.  You don't see or hear anyone, the rooms were lovely and clean.  the villa was fantastic, I can not fault the staff at all.  I would highly recommend staying at this villa, it is a short walk to the beach, breakfast and meals fantastic.  We will be going again.  As another comment said it was like heaven on earth in Bali.
title: Relaxing World Away

text: We were very impressed with our accommodation, it was very spacious and exceptionally clean and quiet with very friendly staff.   Close to beach and shops/restaurants.  Highly recommend for honeymooners as the villas are very quiet and private.
title: great experience

text: The staff here are lovely and helpful and eager to please. They were very helpful and friendly. The villa was gorgeous and looked just like they do on the website. The wifi worked well although there were some dropouts. The food (room service and the breakfast) was surprisingly good. I don't normally expect too much from room service or the included breakfast but it was actually quite delicious. Having your own pool and day bed and deck is an absolute plus. Despite the villas being side by side, you would not know there were people right next door. I barely bumped into anyone else staying there. There is also the beach club on Seminyak beach which was just lovely. The villa is in a good location where you can easily walk out to cafes and restaurants. I also took advantage of the spa which was their sister company - it was slightly more expensive than if I went out on my own but there was transport provided and again great service. So happy to pay that little bit more. Overall it was a fabulous villa and I would gladly go back again.
title: It was a beautiful place and I would love to go back

text:
Seiryu Villa was not our choice when we booked our holiday during the long weekend break in Singapore  but due to full booking we were upgraded to Seiryu Deluxe pool villa.  Though initially based on the review mostly 4-ratings  we were a bit sceptical but  definitely not disappointed after our stay there.  The staff were friendly and our butler attentive but discreet enough to give us our privacy.  Though we stayed in one of the smaller villa but it still looked spacious with the high ceilings.  The breakfast was excellent as it was cooked in our villa's kitchen and we were allowed to have extra servings if we want.  Though the property does not have any restaurant but there are many F&B outlets outside - along the same road.  Pubs with live music are also just 5-10 minute walk - very convenient.  We were also surprised that the villa was mozzie-free as we did not need to use the mosquito repellant provided in the villa.  However, there are still areas that can be improved eg the deck chair looked old with conspicous stains and the pavillion pillows also looked sort of dirty so we dared not lie/sleep on it.  The aircon facing our bed was also noisy during our stay but fortunately the unit in the living room was strong enough to cool the bedroom.  

Special mention and thanks to Embah Rini for her excellent customer service and friendliness.  We will definitely want to come back to Bali and stay in the same villa.
title: Romantic Bali

text:
Our stay at Seiryu has made Bali all the more unforgettable an experience.

The hotel is centrally located,, the rooms are clean and ambience is fantastic..the serenity within the villa inspite of being quite close to the hot-spots of kuta and seminyak was great.

The food menu could do with a few more options, the in-villa dining option was quite worth the money it cost.
title: Unforgettable Bali experience

text:
The villa is incredibly nice and comfortable. The villa is equipped with kitchen, living area, a comfy king size bed, swimming pool and a JACUZZI to relax. The settings of the place make you not want to leave the villa. So make sure you do not have a heavy itinerary while staying there. They have 2 LCD tvs, 1 at the living area and 1 in front of the bed. Wifi is provided in Villa. The butler was very prompt on their service upon request. Overall the place is ideal for couples who wants to have a romantic getaway.

There are few areas that can be improved. Such as the cleanliness of the sun bed area but as this is outdoor it might not be under their control. For a villa that has everything else,  the taste of the food needs to be improved. 

Overall the stay was pleasant and a memorable one. We will consider coming back to stay here again.
title: Seiryu Villa - Home away from Home

text: My husband and I stayed at the Seiryu Villas (NOTE TO SEIRYU OWNER: Change the name, no one can pronounce it) while in Seminyak, Bali. These villas have a cheesy, gaudy japanese-inspired theme to them which ugly fake orchids everywhere and paintings of blossoms. It was a lovely change from the hotel scene, as the villas is private with a small pool (not very functional though), and a kitchen and bathroom alone with a big main bedroom/living room area. I enjoyed this over any hotel in Bali, simply because it was so much more comfortable to be able to feel like you're in your own little house. You feel peaceful and quiet. The internet was great which was important to us, and the location was decent though not great. The kitchen was nice, and they staff brings you breakfast to the kitchen every morning which was great even though the food like all the food in Bali SUCKED. Cold eggs, nasty fruit, this gross museli stuff which is like soggy oatmeal, and shriveled up seaweed-like spinach, etc. Still, it was nice. We stayed here during the Balinese/Hindu New Year, the DAY of Silence, which is basically Bali on lockdown. Your trapped in yor house/hotel and you can't leave or "turn on bright lights" or anything...they also apparently thought it would be good for the trapped guests to have their tv channels cut off...or maybe all of Bali did I don't know...all I know was THANK GOD we were in a villa not a hotel or we would've gone stir-crazy. Over all it was nice but I would've probably preferred a different prite villa.
title: Nice private villa, much more comfortable than hotel but not overly impressive.

text:
Having stayed at three different hotels during our stay in Bali, the Seiryu was a treat. The villas are incredible, just like the photos if not better. While the villas are incredibly private and you could easilly be forgiven for spending your entire holiday there, the beach is just down the road along with some cheap and very good places to eat and get a massage.
Breakfast is served to the villa at whatever time you nominate, with staff leaving you in entire privacy. There's even a kitchen if you were inclined to cook for yourself.
Incredibly luxurious, we were very happy with our stay.
title: Amazing, the highlight of our trip!

text:
I read such great reviews of this villa and was looking forward to our stay here over Christmas.  I was rather disappointed.
The Villa itself was great, but not clean.  The cushions had dodgy stains on them.  The sunbed cushions were dirty.
Again I expected great things from the breakfast, having read that this is the highlight of the Villa.  And again, I was disappointed.  I tried every single breakfast they had to offer, and nothing was good.  Just ordinary.
Service was good enough - this is Bali after all.
Location was great - 8 minute walk to the beach. A short ride to town.
But really, very expensive for what it was - an ordinary villa, with mediocre food and ordinary service.
title: Disappointing

text:
The villa is clean and tidy, with maximum level of privacy ensured.

This is a perfect place for honeymoon and couple getaway. We love the pool with ample space for swimming and the sunbed which is perfect for resting after a tiring swim or for star gazing at night. Veils are also installed to prevent insect bites. 

The hall is equipped with a large TV and DVD player. We managed to purchase some cheap DVDs and spend time watching the movies. For those who love to cook, the kitchen has a complete set of utensils and cultery. All you need is to do some grocery shopping to make your own meals. 

Every part of the villa evokes an aura of Zen and has been merticulously designed with attention to details (which manifests the spirit of Japanese culture).

I strongly recommend this villa for a romantic getaway.
title: Fantastic Stay

photos.caption: The Bathroom that leads directly into the pool

text: We have stayed here for 2 nights and are just about to leave the seiryu villas. We have stayed in many villas in Bali and the Seiryu Villas are great. We stayed in Room A3, which was beautiful. The villa itself is very big. We had 2 tv's and 2 dvd players.. and beautiful low laying couch. The daybed outside is devine, and steps down into the pool. We got sun for most of the day on the pool and sunbaking area, which was great. they supply an umbrella for the non sunbaking types. The price for these villas is quite cheap in comparison to other villas in the area. (we paid about $250 AUS on wotif.com). The location is fine.. not AMAZING but totally fine. Its located down the end of a little street off the main road. A 10 minute walk... or 30 second motorbike ride. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We would stay here again!
title: Huge Villa with a beautiful layout and amazing day bed by the pool!

text:
I have just recently had 3 nights at this wonderful villa......the villa is of utmost quality and provides a great escape.

The room was wonderfully appointed with all the amenities one wouuld need....the room was cleaned and serviced more than once daily....the breakfast served in your room was was above standard.

The best thing about the hotel was without doubt the service the staff, mini and kadek especially were great.  They made your stay even more pleasurable.  The manager and Kadek went out of their way when i first arrived to track down my credit card which i had left in atm.  They found it for me too!

I negotiated directly with the villa for the best rate

I would highly recommend anyone using these villas they are in a great spot and provide a relaxing getaway!
title: the most wondderful stay

text: Don't believe the other reviews - this place has gone downhill badly. Terrible service. Rats and huge bugs everywhere. Terrible billing policy. Horrible food. Noisy, smell neighborhood. I have nothing good to say about this place.
title: Horrible place - gone downhill fast

text:
Even before we left Bali, we already knew we want to stay at The Seiryu again during our next trip! 

From the hotel's stunning design to the 1st rate service, The Seiryu is what you call a real all-rounder. We love soooo many things about the hotel but we were particularly taken by the long, dark corridor that takes you from the reception area to the villas. What a great design concept!

The cleverly thought-out design of the hotel was of course extended to the villas itself. The villa was luxurious, spacious... yet functional. Bed was comfortable and kitchen facilities were astounding - complete with coffee maker, toaster, blender, utensils, etc! The bathroom comes with a nice sized jacuzzi bath and even has a door that leads directly to the pool!

So yes, the pool was sensational too. Had so much fun soaking up the sun and just sipping cocktails by the pool. Was hard to leave the pool alone ;p

Breakfast was good with a choice of american/jap/indonesian (which i believe rotates so you dont end up with the same thing everyday). Personally thought the indonesian one was best tasting. Coffee was decent too. 

To top it all off, The Seiryu has the most wonderful staff (congrats to Sukanada and team) who gave us the warmest service without being intruding at all.

Way to go!
title: Beyond Impressed. Simply bowled over!

text:
It was a gorgeous place. We liked everything about the design from the moment we stepped in at the entrance. There were a lot of japanese themed designs which were really refreshing and beautiful. We stayed at Villa A, and the interior was just like the picture. It was spacious, clean and had modern designs. There were two tvs! One at the living room and one in front of the bed which is just a few steps away. 

We love the breakfast. And it was served to us in the kitchen. We also ordered room service and the food was delicious and value for money. Service was good. Staffs were friendly and helpful, and they made sure they gave us the privacy that we wanted. 

It's located on a small road. Initially it was a bit worrying, but after familiaring ourselves with the area, we realized that the location is quite strategic. There were lots restaurants and shops within walking distance. Jln Laksamana, which is famous for its eateries were only 1-2 minutes drive away. It's really quiet at the villa, away from the hustle and bustle, and gave us the peace and quiet which we wanted.

Our only complain was the mosquitoes. There weren't many but it still disturbed our sleep at night. Although, I've heard that this is quite common for villas in bali. We had to sleep with some lights on at night. Fortunately, that seem to solve the problem.
title: Beautiful and quiet place perfect for retreat

photos.caption: The private pool take from the connecting indoor bathroom

text: We always travel to Bali at least once a year. Never found a villa as unique as the Seiryu. Stayed at the Seiryu for 2 nights and it was a great. We had a villa with Japanese “autumn theme” (the Seiryu has 4 types of villas i.e. spring, summer, autumn, and winter). The staffs were very friendly and helpful. We arrived at the Seiryu at 1 am in the morning (we had the last flight from Jakarta). However, the staffs still helped us to check in and delivered our luggage to the villa with a smile on their faces (looking quite sleepy though). We have a photo shoot at 5 am in the morning (4 hours after we checked in) and ask whether it will be possible to serve breakfast at 4 am. Amazingly they managed to serve coffee, breads, and fresh fruits at 4 am (no additional charge since breakfast was included). The bed was huge and really comfortable. The bathroom was very clean. Love everything about this villa.
title: Wonderful Villa, Wonderful Staffs

text:
With the many good reviews about this hotel, i have decided to make a reservation with them for my honeymoon on Oct 2009. Well, that comes the problem, i have sent 2 emails to them. First, asking bout more informations, deals and payments. No reply after a week. Even though i did not get any answers, i still trust that my upcoming holiday will not be a bad one due to many pleasant reviews here. So i sent out my second email, stating reservations and more enquiries on payment wise. After 3 weeks, still no reply. 

I was deeply disappointed. I used both the reservation system in their website and reservation email. As much as i would love to try their hotel and packages, they have not showed me any sincerity, seriousness and kinship in making any business deals.

I will not consider or even think bout this place again. As for now, i have booked another hotel who replied my emails within 6hrs, answering all my questions and even special deals.
title: They are not interested at all

text:
After having researched a fair bit on the net, I decided to stay at the Seiryu for my honeymoon for 4 nights. As soon as we stepped out of the airport and were met with our driver, I knew it there and then that the Seiryu was a great choice. We were greeted with chilled towels and water and driven straight to the villa, which was tucked away in a quiet corner in Seminyak. The location is very appropriate; 5 minutes walk from the busy Seminyak stretch and 3 minutes to the beach. The villa (B2) was spotlessly clean and the Japanese ambience was pleasing. The little touches are what make a stay memorable. Like the perfumed oils burning everywhere, the gentle music in the corridors, the honeymoon decoration in the villa, fresh juice on arrival, everyone calling you by your name etc. The check in was fast and easy.

My wife was amazed at the genuine smile that the staff of the hotel always had and like in true Balinese style hospitality, people went out of the way to make our stay a memorable one. The pool in the villa was clean the the housekeeping did their job very well. 

I have stayed in many 5 star hotels in various parts of the world but the level of service that the Seiryu has to offer does exceed most; it is great value for money. It is advisable to approach the management directly to get good offers. The food is nice, though not the best but then the location of the Seiryu is so appropriate that it is easy to walk to any of the nice restaurants or bars. 

Thank you Seiryu and Sukanada for making my honeymoon a memorable one. I would definitely recommend Seiryu to everyone and would love to go back.
title: Very good

text:
We stayed at the villas for 8 fab nights at the end of April-May.  We were looking for a private villa to relax in but also wanted to be able to walk around the Bali area- Seiryu definitely met all of this.
From the minute we were picked up from the airport to the time we left all our needs were met.  The staff were great and our experience was memorable.
Seiryu is a relaxing place to stay- everything available at villa and shopping & restaurants are all within walking distances.
The villa & pool were impeccably maintained & 10 out of 10 for cleanliness.
Thanks Seiryu - we will be back.
title: Relaxing,peaceful & great staff

text: This place was amazing, I have stayed in 5 star hotels around the world and this is at the top of the list. Our villa was beautiful, we couldn't believe how perfect everything was with the utmost attention to detail. The in villa pool was so lovely to come home to and the bathroom was amazing with a huge jacuzzi bathtub. We did get a special last minute rate by liaising with the manager, which included taxes, breakfast and airport transfers. ($150 US). The staff are really wonderful and can't do enough to help you. In terms of location, it is about a 5 minute walk to the beach where you can rent sun loungers and an umbrella for about $3 US per day. The shopping is nice in Seminyak and it is about another 5 minutes walk to the main shopping street. There are some really great restaurants around (we loved La Sal, thought Gado Gado was a bit overrated though).  The only drawback to Bali is that people are constantly trying to rip you off, always check the change you receive back and your bills. We were mistakenly billed for another night by the Seriyu so be sure to check your hotel bill as well. Aside from that everything was really perfect. There is also free wireless internet in all of the rooms and dvds which you can have a lend of from the front desk. I would definitely come back.
title: Incredible spot, A+++++

text: From the checking in of your Villa to departing and saying goodbye, our stay here was a complete package. We had never stayed in a Villa before but have always managed to stay in minimum 4 star accomodation around the world. The price we paid was a great rate seeing as it's low season in Bali at the moment, the rate also included cocktail and refreshment towel on arrival, airport transfers and free daily breakfast which is set up for your every morning by the butler. The Villa was beautiful! We had searched many Villa's around Bali and especially the Seminyak area but this one seemed to catch our eye as it didn't look like every other Villa around.  Very private and secluded in a great location close to the beach and sourrounding restaurants. We actually hardly left the Villa during our 4 nights stay, we didn't want or need to! Room service was always great and all the staff were so friendly and considerate!! We'll definitley be back again to experience the Seiryu Villa's!!
title: The Seiryu Villas is a complete package and exceeds your expectation!

photos.caption: To begin our day, breakfast which is set up by your butler in your private dining area.
The Gazebo and garden by night...Just magic!
You can literally jump into the pool from your bathroom!
The private lap pool with waterfall in the evening - Loved this!
The Gazebo in the day, so relaxing to just read your book or have a nap.
Another shot of the bed with the flat screen TV for viewing
The very luxurious bed - Very comfortable pillows!
The day beds for lazing in the sun!

text:
Stayed in Type A Villa (no. B3):
Very spacious! Homely feel with charming modern decor, warm lighting in bedroom and unique japanese design influences. Large comfy sofa and bed. LCD TV and DVD player in the living room as well as the bedroom. Well-equipped kitchen with hot-and-cold mineral water dispenser. You can jump into the pool directly from the bathroom.

Breakfast:
Good spread, prepared in the kitchen and served in the villa. Choice of American, Japanese, and Balinese/Indonesian menus.

Location:
Nestled in a more secluded area, but central enough so it's just a quick and inexpensive taxi ride to most places such as "eat-street".

Service:
This is a new establishment, so there may be some teething issues with service consistency. Some staff were very helpful and friendly; some looked like and behaved as if they were having a bad day.

Overall:
This place is a hidden find on the merits of the villa alone. Value-for-money and definitely recommended for a short stay. I got a very good rate liaising directly with the villa management but airport transfer was not included.
title: Definitely a hidden gem

text: We stayed at the seiryu from the 15/2/09 to the 2/3/09 in B2.  We were met at the airport with cool towels and water, which was a nice touch and set the mood for the seiryu experiance. The villas themselves were spotlessly clean , I was very impressed with the cleaning service provided, the villa was cleaned daily as would be expected but it was lovely to come home from dinner to find the oil burners lit the bed turned down and the kimonas provided changed also. The position of the villas is not an issue, it is in walking distance of good  restaurants such as gado gado. Our experiance was flawless at the seiryu and have no hesitation in recommending it as a truely wonderful and romantic place to stay.
title: Perfect.

text: We stayed at the The Seiryu Villas from the 4/03/09 to 13/03/09 in villa B3. The accommodation and experience at Seiryu is amazing. We were picked up from the airport and offered a cool drink and cold towel in the car and on arrival at the villas. Check in was fast and friendly. Staff are always there to help with bags etc. The villa is luxurious, clean and new. It is your own sanctury is busy bustling Bali. There is a private entrance for guests and one for butler/staff. The pool is immaculate. The bed was HUGE!!. Everything was just perfect. The located is fine. Just a 3 minute walk to the beach- it is just around the corner from the Sofitel. Great restaurants nearby such as Gado Gado, Zanzibar (in Legian), Made's Warung etc etc. Not on the main strip of Seminyak, but it doesnt need to be. The street is quiet with a restaurant next door. There is also La Sol Spanish Restaurant up the road 2 min walk- highly recommend. Room service is great at the villas, breakfast was also good - they set it up in your villa. I dont usually stay at a place without reviews but I took a chance with Seiryu and it was well worth it. Got a great rate by emailing the manager direct and due to mid season/economic crisis etc so dont know if great rates will apply forever. I highly, highly recommend The Seiryu Villas. We would go back tomorrow.
title: Amazing, Luxurious, Relaxing. Highlight of our holiday.

text:
We had problems with our aircon 

Curtains are stained, the villa needs a general overhaul. Towels are old and starting to fall apart around the edges.

Breakfast was average and coffee very different from day to day!

Location is great! Near the heart of Seminyak and walking distance from the beach and nice restaurants

We stayed here in 2014 and we remember it as perfect! But unfortunately not quite so perfect anymore
title: 2nd time not a charm

text: The villa far exceeded our expectations and was even nicer in person than in the pictures shown. The staff were all exceptionally friendly and helpful and made us feel very welcome. The villa was very clean and had excellent facilities. The bathroom had lots of toiletries available and we loved the fresh bathrobe every day. The private pool was brilliant and it was lovely to have a garden space to relax in also. The breakfast was delivered to the villa every morning and there were lots of nice options to choose from. The location is excellent, just a short walk (less than 10 minutes) to Seminyak beach and lots of restaurants. We were very sad to leave the villa and would highly recommend a stay here!

text:
Villa is amazing, so large. Huge kitchen with all the gear. Large lounge room and bedroom. Pool is awesome as well. Day bed next to pool. Bathroom opens so you can walk into pool. 
When we stayed the water pressure was terrible. Toilet had trouble flushing because of this pressure issue. 
The wooden floor boards on the beck need maintenance as they are loose. 
Overall the place is great though and would recommend this to others who want a large one bedroom Villa with plenty of space and a large pool. Pool is long but not very deep about 1.2m I think. Close to plenty of shops but down a street away from the busy traffic and noise. 
Breakfast is a bit of a let down if ordering the American style. But few places close that offer a cheap breaky that I decided to use.

text:
Very beautiful and clean villa. Every corner of these villa interior exudes the richness of Japanese artistic nuance. I felt like I was staying in Japan. Very comfortable villa. Complete facilities and in the pantry all cooking utensils are available.
For the bathroom, all the facilities are also complete with a rainy shower and bathtub and there is direct access from the bathroom to the swimming pool, this is very efficient.
Some of the things that were a little lacking when I stayed here were inadequate local TV broadcasts but a folder with movies was provided which in my opinion was goof movie (box office). Not comfortable with the toilet which is a bit difficult when flash but still can only need more pressure.
title: Beautiful & Complete Villa

text: We stayed here 3 nights in March 2020. The villa comes with a private pool, kitchen, 1 large king bed, huge living area and bath tub in shower. Very clean, spacious interior and exterior, fully air conditioned though kitchen looks a bit dated. Breakfast is provided, suffice and adequate for two. Location is strategic, about 5-10 mins walk to Seminyak beach, a Circle K mart right outside the villa and also walking distance to the hype of Seminyak bars, massage parlors and restaurants. Perfect customer service, great location, beautiful villa and definitely recommended to all.
title: Perfect villa for couple and family

text:
We stayed at the Seiryu Villas for our last night in Bali and booked a private pool villa just the day before. When we arrived for our check-in we've been advised that we got the upgrade to the bigger one. 

The villa was amazing, huge and literally we felt we didn't want to move from there. 
Amazing service from the people at the service desk and very warm and welcoming. 

Even for just one night, they made us feel so comfortable, in fact we added a late check out to enjoy our stay until late on the next day as our flight back to Sydney was only after 10 pm. 

I would definitely recommend this place also for the location, 5-10 min walk from Seminyak Beach, close to shopping area and 5 min drive to the iconic Eat Street.
title: Amazing stay! Loved it!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We stayed in #A2 at the tail end of our trip to Bali to celebrate our 25th Anniversary and the Seiryu Villas was definitely meant for couples. With only 8 villas in total, it was a perfect place to relax and unwind in the privacy of your own villa. 

The staff were excellent and well trained to cater to your every need. They always went out of their way to ask how our day was and where we were off to or if we needed anything. Free breakfast every morning was a perfect way to start your day as they brought it to your villa at the your desired time. It was delicious and filling and plenty of choice. 

The location was good, a short walk to the beach and a longer walk to the main strip where most restaurants, cafes, shops and night life were situated.  The walk is nice during the day if you walk along the beach to reach Seminyak Square but at night it seems longer because the road that the Seiryu is on is much quieter and not as busy with the businesses on that road shutting down earlier or just have very little traffic. If you prefer to stay closer to where all the action is, this may not be the place for you. 

Alternatively if you prefer a quiet place and privacy, this place is perfect. The villa is definitely luxurious with your own little entrance, patio, pool, separate living area and full sized kitchen. It's definitely huge for 2 people but we enjoyed the privacy and the gorgeous facility. 

All in all, I would definitely return to the Seiryu Villas !
title: Luxury Villas

text: How this property receives such commendable responses is surprising.  The vanity basin in our bathroom was blocked the entire stay and while repeated reports were made to reception no one bothered to fix it. There were obvious drainage/sewage issues in the bathroom/toilet areas which were camouflaged by air freshening tabs...It smelt. The lighting was very dim and in some parts of the villa so dim that my spouse referred to the bathroom as "The black hole of Calcutta". The kitchen sink and bathroom vanity plugs desperately needed some Jif. Kitchen amenities comprised of a well worn kettle and a saucepan - both of which were unusable and not suitable for boiling water, even after a good scrub. On the positive side , the breakfast was good but there was an inconsistent supply of condiments. The staff were pleasant and genuinely trying to do their best so I feel sorry to say that I cannot recommend this property and would advise to stay elsewhere.
title: Black Hole of Calcutta

text:
I just got back from Bali and am already suffering from withdrawal symptoms. Bali has so much to offer and that includes The Seiryu Villas. Staff at the property were all smiles and very friendly while being eager to accommodate to our requests. Its a very small group of staff as there are only a handful of villas on the property but that makes for a more pleasant experience as there won’t be a need to wait for attention from the staff. Great bunch and they are assets to the property. 

The stay in the villa was very comfortable and there was more than enough space for a couple. Nights were spent sitting by the pool and sipping beer. Furthermore, housekeeping has done a great job in ensuring the villa was clean and that includes the outdoor patio and pool. We were staying at Four Points by Sheraton before Seiryu and the cleanliness of the Seiryu villas beat Four Points hands down. Floors were squeaky clean and none of the sand found when staying in other villas.

Breakfast was being served in the villa’s dining room every morning upon your requested time and choice of food. Choices gets pretty limited though, after 3-4 mornings. Nonetheless, nothing beats having breakfast served in your villa and having the choice to eat in bed. 

The only gripe I have with Seiryu Villas is that it needs to be renovated as well as have a change of furniture, mattress included. Although the villas were very clean, the fittings are getting tired and could be replaced. However, this should not stop anyone from staying at Seiryu Villas. 

Lastly, I would like to add on that Seiryu villas is located in a safe and quiet area beside Courtyard by Marriott but also very near to dining and drinking establishments.
title: Great service and decent value!!!

text:
The villa in it's glory days would have been sight and the villa itself is spacious and nice. We made a last minute booking (2 days before we arrived) and because we wanted to stay in Seminyak without having to pay a fortune at one of the beach-side resorts that were available when we made the booking, we settled with this place.

It's dated and although you can see that updates are being made and the villas are well appointed, it's not a 5 star property.

Here's a few reasons why;
- I've traveled during local holiday and the villa was running on a skeleton crew. Shuttle services weren't available as advertised due to holidays. 
- You feel a bit stranded as the other options available are car shares or taxis, and both are a bit of a problem. Car shares don't now where the villa is resulting in 20-30 minutes before the car shows up after booking and flagging down a taxi can result in exorbitant fares.
- Breakfast system - can only order one main per person but any egg dish is a 'main'. My wife tried to get the fruit smoothie bowl with some poached eggs, which was flat out denied and invoked a sermon on how the system works. I had to cut in and just ask for some fruit
- Staff's English isn't great. Simple requests have to be repeated and even then they need to be in short sentences and to the point. It's also evident that staff have been trained on what to say at times and sounds rehearsed. What is said can be repetitive and frustrating as you don't feel like you're getting anywhere. Anything besides what they've been trained in becomes a lengthy conversation, with you doing most of the talking to get them to understand and although you do see a glimpse of empathy  normally ends with a 'no'.
- There are no facilities other than what's in the villas. Can't even take a shower after checkout. 
- No management presence on site. Again this could be because of the holidays, but simple matters that probably need approval from management could have boosted this review.

Restaurants around aren't bad but not great either.
Made Warung is about a 10 minute walk. Frankly we didn't like it. Too salty and almost sure it's been spiced up with MSG. Found better restaurants a ride away.

My view is that this isn't a place for people that are used to 5-star resorts and the services that come with it. 

I can see that it would appeal to couples wanting a romantic getaway with privacy. If you want or need more, this isn't it.
title: Not 5 star

Definitely will go back anytime I visit Bali and I highly recommend it!
title: Best in Seminyak

We were met at the airport by our driver. 
When we arrived, we were warmly welcomed to a beautiful room- swan on the huge bed, rose petals in the bath and a honey moon cake. All of which were of no extra charge. 
The location is great- very quiet area, close to Seminyak square and the beach. 
Breakfast was served daily with our choice of Indonesian, western or continental. 
The staff were extremely welcoming. 
Airport pick up and drop off were no extra charge. 

The only criticism is the dated decor throughout the villa. In need of a bit of a revamp. 
Other than that, a very comfortable stay in a private, quiet, spacious villa!
