The service was excellent and the staff were always helpful and friendly. The private pool was extremely handy to cool off from the warm weather and provided a really relaxing experience. The location was quite good, only a five minute walk to the beach from which you could walk to Ku de Ta in 5 mins or the opposite way to Legian & Kuta. The main beach is pretty average with dirty estuaries running into the ocean. Head to Padang Padang if you want a good beach day. All in all, there wasn't much to fault. There are spas and restaurants nearby and taxis are inexpensive to get around. Thanks to Made and the staff who made it a seamless stay.
title: A seamless experience

text:
We stayed in The Seiryu villas for 4 days after 4 days at The Samaya in Ubud. Perhaps the Samaya had set the bar up high (we were thoroughly pampered there!), but we were left somewhat disappointed by what The Seiryu had promised to be. While it prides itself for being a quiet oasis in the hustle and bustle of Seminyak; the villa is, frankly speaking, out of the way. The long, gloomy walkway to the villa constantly reminds us that we are returning to the mothership, and can be very freaky once it's dark outside. While the villa is generally comfortable, I'd expect much more for the price paid. A mish-mash of Balinese and Zen elements, the decor of the place feels like it can't decide what it wants to be rather than the purported fusion of the 2. Aesthetics are prized over functionality and the sink is the most ridiculous, shallow thing ever that promised to splash at any unsuspecting person the moment he/she turns the tap on!

 Service is erratic and inconsistent, with the villa foregoing the turn down service altogether on the last night - our late, half-eaten breakfast ( we had it eleven-ish) sat forlornly until the next morning! On one occasion, the in-villa breakfast was set up sans cutlery. Food is very mediocre in quality and the quality of the  same item is very much of a lucky dip. We ordered the same coffee for 3 days in a row and every morning it came served differently and tasted different.

One should certainly expect to befriend a host of insects (this is villa living afterall), but there were so many mosquitoes in the room, the bites kept my partner awake all night. To be fair, the staff promised to help us fumigate the room and we found ourselves in a slightly improved situation the 2nd night. 

The villa is a 15 minute stroll to the main thoroughfare of Seminyak and is a 10 min walk to the beach. We were told by the staff at the villa that there deck chairs marked out for guests at The Seiryu to use but after half an hour of searching, we couldn't find it. Given its mediocrity for its price, I'd try somewhere else in the future, there are plenty of other more attractive options a skip and a hop away.
title: Heaps of potential but not quite up to expectations

text: Seiryu villas is a good villas with beautiful, nice and clear. All the equipment looks new and modern. The location is good, near by the main street and beach. I had a really good times here. if you are the first time to bali, i think its a great choice to stay here.
title: Good Villas with good maintain and location

text:
Villa A3:

Overall, it had been a really lovely stay for my hubby & I. We were given the privacy we needed. However the staff will be there as and when they were needed. Staff were friendly and approachable. Good choice of breakfast & in-room dining menu. Comfy bed & pillows. Good location. Walking distance to the beach & Seminyak dining streets. Amenities were well provided. Fresh fruit bowl replenished almost everyday we were there. There'sa mineral water dispenser in the kitchen. When we left, the staff actually lined up at the exit's corridor & waved us goodbye. It was very sweet. We really had a well-rested stay at Seiryu. :)

However, just a a few things that can be improved:

1)  We noticed upon checking into the villa that the outdoor pavillion's cushion covers were yellowed with age. They were not changed throughout the 3 nights we stayed.

2) The resort only provide a normal iron (no steam function) & ironing board had rusty coloured stain on its cover.  We were attending a wedding and even though we had pre-ironed our clothes before packing into the suitcase, we decided to send for pressing service since the iron wasn't appropriate for ironing linen and chiffon. However, the pressing service was a disappointment. The shirt's collar wasn't ironed and the whole shirt itself wasn't ironed properly.  The trousers were ironed flat. There were sharp lines on the sides of the seams. My front of my dress (which was pre-ironed before packing) was more creased then when I had sent it. They had an hour to iron 1 shirt, 1 pair of long trousers, 1 pair of shorts & a short dress. I ended up having to re-iron all of the items.

So, Seiryu management, I hope you can improve on the above. Thank you very much for your hospitality.
title: A place to reunite a couple..

text:
Seiryu villa is one of the best villa we have stayed. Royal room B4 was really beautiful and nice & cosy. Villa has well equip with very good maintenance and almost everything you want and best services provided. And definetly one of the most recommend villa for anyone to consider in Bali. The foods was nice by the room services, hotel staffs are very warm and courteous and very pleasant. Breakfast was well prepare and display and delivered in our villa daily.It's has been a great pleasure staying in Seiryu and hotel staffs are very thoughful to prepare a birthday cake for my friend travelling with me in the villa. It's was indeed a big surprise for us and we were really touch by the sincere thoughful preparation. Hotel staffs are very thoughful and also note of guest birthday, I presume they view the birth date from our passport when we check in.
We have an enjoyable birthday celebration and great relax stay at the villa.The jaccuci was great, the whole villa was really big and spacious. The bed was really comfortable and big in size. It's is one of the most memorable enjoyable vocation stay at this villa that we have.Once again, thank you Seiryu. I would definetly come back to stay again if I am back to Bali.
title: Thank you Seiryu and services staffs

text:
This was my first visit to Bali and it was our pleasure to stay at Seiryu Villas for 11 nights.  This was home-base in Bali for my partner and I and the staff at Seiryu Villas provided a peerless service experience.  While it was my first trip to  Bali it was my partner’s sixth so I am benefited by her experience.  For me as a first time Bali visitor I was immediately impressed by this villa experience from the service to the décor, appointment and facilities provided inside.  My partner meanwhile has stayed at other luxury facilities including huge, multi-bedroom villas designed for 4 people or more.  Her more educated opinion of Seiryu matches my own, in particular on the service front.  Every staff member no matter what time of the day or night remembers your name, knows whether you’ve placed your breakfast order and is so helpful.  This level of engagement is managed alongside utmost privacy.

The villa itself is the perfect couple’s retreat.  Private pool (which you can step into directly from the bathroom as well as outside - loved this), daybed, attractive outdoor area with outdoor shower, comfortable king size bed, good wireless internet access, study area, dining room.  The villas are generously appointed and feel luxurious & substantial.  We put the 24 hour butler service to the test and the meal options and their preparation were excellent.  I’m a vegetarian and was never short of options.

I absolutely loved our stay at Seiryu and thank the amazing staff for adding so much to our trip.
title: Expectations exceeded.

text: My partner and l stayed at Seiryu villas for 11 nights in April and we had such a great experience. I was especially impressed with the level of privacy the staff gave each villa and how much the staff made you feel welcome and important as a guest. They remember your name, if you've ordered breakfast and we never noticed the staff in our villa but they always cleaned the rooms to a high standard. The villa felt like a home away from home with it's attention to detail with the atmosphere and comfortable surrounding. Especially if your away with a partner for a romantic holiday l would highly recommend you to stay at this villa.
title: A home away from home with amazing service

text:
Firstly dont expect a big massive over populated hotel, its a beautiful private little boutique villa that has some of the best staff in bali. 

We took our 8 month old baby and they were more than accommodating, when we got there they had a cot all set up for us in our room and they were excited to meet our baby.

They treated us like we were special, and we felt as if we were the only ones staying there even thou we weren't.

The villa was also great it was simple but taste full and very comfortable especially with a baby.
I would recommend this villa to anyone who wants to stay some were quiet right in the middle of seminyak, and of course if your taking a baby its highly recommended.

Thank you sooooo much to all the wonderfull staff that made our holiday a very memorable one. we will be back.
title: Amazing Service

text:
We originally selected Seiryu Villas because it is designed for couples, and not for families with small children. We have our own children (5) and have appreciated holidays with them. But this holiday was going to be a getaway for two and we did not want to sit by a pool that was filled with the worst type of children; other people’s. :-) 

We found the perfect spot at Seiryu. Once you walk through the front door you feel like you have escaped from the world. The peaceful Japanese design pulls you in and surrounds you in the most pleasant ways. 

The facility is fabulous. Your own private pool, with stairs that go right into (or out of) the large shower and bath area of the villa. 

The villa itself was spacious and well designed. The air-conditioning worked well, the bed was large and comfortable and there was plenty of closet space for our ten-day stay. Large screen TV’s, DVD players and iPod docks were appreciated as well. 

When we left Seiryu, we had a short walk to the beach, restaurants, shops and ten or fifteen thousand taxis. So the location was ideal.

But the standout at Seiryu was the staff. Friendly? Yes. Efficient? Yes. But most of all you could really feel the care and interest they took in their guests. From the morning greeting at breakfast to their response to any request. 

We enjoyed Afternoon Tea with Made Sandi, the Operations Manager. He told us about Bali and its customs, traditions and people. He spoke of his family and told us that he wanted his guests to feel like family, not customers. We did.

It was difficult to leave Seiryu, made even more difficult when staff members gathered at the front door to see us off as we departed for the airport. There are many great villas in Bali, but the decision on where to stay on our next visit has already been made. Seiryu.
title: Ahhhh, the peace.

photos.caption: Step out of the bathroom and into your pool

text:
Stayed 5 nights at the Seiryu Villas and both my friend and I felt we made the right choice! No regrets!

The villa is designed with tranquillity and privacy in mind. Room is simple but tastefully done up and comfortable. The villa is surrounded by high walls but the compound is spacious enough so you do not feel too caged in. Reading a book at the gazebo/daybed after swimming in the private pool is a great way to pass your day! You can also borrow a few DVDs (updated selection) from the reception to kill your time. 

Breakfast is served daily in your villa at the time you desire. Food might not be the tastiest but the breakfast choices/spread is pretty sumptuous! There was this morning where we had to leave at 2am for a volcano hike and the staff prepared a breakfast box for us to have on the go! Just one example of the warm service we experienced throughout our stay!

Seiryu does not have its own in-house restaurant or spa but no worries, there are 2 restaurants (Sorriso and Delicious Onion) and a spa (Vitamin) just next door. Location wise, nestled inside a quiet lane, the villa is a short leisure walk away from the bustling streets of Seminyak and the beach. If you wish to go to Kuta, the villa provides a shuttle service. 

Our stay at Seiryu felt like home away from home so thank YOU to all the staff at the Seiryu Villas for making our stay a wonderful and memorable one!
title: Enjoyed our stay..!

text:
Stayed here in 2011. The place was quite hidden and I wasn't expected such a private and tranquil place in Seminyak Area.

The staff is very friendly even to us Indonesian, and this place was pure heaven...lovin' the simplicity and the design of the room which is very peaceful and zen-like.

Breakfast was quite ok with a few selection of japanese, western, indonesian food...portion is quite generous...good experience for the japanese breakfast but I would say taste-wise nothing spectacular.

Few things to notice : 
1. as each villa is only next to each other, it's very possible that you could hear your neighbour if they're quite noisy, but it didn't happen to me during my stay. 
2. During our stay, I have to tell the butler to inform us beforehand if they're going to come to our room and only enter the room if we have gave them the permission. (it wouldn't be funny if you're doing something really private in the villa and the butler enter just to deliver your breakfast or want to clean up your room for you)

But other than that, I would definitely recommend this place to whoever is looking for a serene place around seminyak and for honeymoon-er, this place is fantastic! :)
title: Amazing villa

text: My husband and I had a really wonderful time. The food was delicious, and super generous in portion. I was never able to finish up every bit of the food. And Thank you Mini for helping get a last minute tailoring done. Do allow me to thank you all for the wonderful time My husband and I had from 27 Feb 12 to 01 Mar 12. Thanks Made, Nada, Mini, Sernei and all whom my husband and I have met during our stay. I’m sure I will come back to Seiryu again in a matter of time.
title: Perfect Honeymoon Paradise

photos.caption: Lovely Dinner Setting by the Villa Management

text: after negotiating the beautiful madness that is the drive from the airport into Seminyak, we released a huge sigh when we entered into the Seiryu Villas.  The photos do not do justice to the tranquility and peace surrounding this complex.  You couldn't possibly imagine that you are right in the middle of busy Seminyak.  Close proximity to the beach was a must for us, and a gentle 5 min walk took us straight to Seminyak beach with lots of bars/eateries right on the sand. The villas were breathtaking and the staff were always unobtrusive and yet exceptionally helpful.  Having a hot tasty breakfast delivered to our room each day gave us the luxury of planning our day peacefully, privately and leisurely.  This is an ideal spot if you are looking for a relaxing holiday and haven to escape to after a busy day in Bali.
title: A tiny piece of Paradise, nestled in Paradise

text: I had a wonderful time with my partner in this honeymoon. The service and staff was really good and firendly. I love the exterior, especially the pool. We can swim privately. I will recommend this villa to any of my friends. Really enjoy my time here.
title: wonderful place, private, nice and friendly staff

text:
we stayed 5 days 4 nights in the deluxe villa in late jan 2012. 
good points
- impeccable service and very friendly staff available 24/7 who make good recommendations with regards to dining, clubbing, activities options 
- superb location (very quiet and tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the main road yet close to the beach and good restaurants nearby)
- very private (you might stay the whole trip and not see another guest at all)
- very tasteful design and overall concept (japanese aesthetic fused with balinese decor)

bad points
- WI-FI signal indoors seemed pretty weak. was slightly better outdoors
- dining room/kitchen in deluxe villa was a bit dark
- if getting the spa treatment at the villa's sister spa company, better to book at the spa itself than through the hotel (we got ripped off about a 20% difference)
title: Perfect Launchpad to Explore Bali

text: I had a great time here with my partner. The service was excellent and the staff was really friendly. All decorations were up to date and kept very well. I would recommend to any of my mate who are interested to have a couple stay at this villa. Loved the outdoor pool. It was quite and no one to disturb you. Will definetly go back to this place when I am back in Bali. It was close to everything to shop and food and the beach as well. All was walking distance.
title: Excellent place, peaceful and very friendly staff

text:
No disturbing insects. great service. Bed is really very great. decorated nicely. whole layout was splendid. 
the only thing is the swimming pool is too cold. breakfast send to the room was marvelous even the taste. i would recommend those who is coming for honeymoon for this villa. The space,the environment, the service..what can i say you guys really left a great experience on our stay. 
You may get gedeh as the driver(supir) for the trip.. he is a good friend plus a great driver who knows his way around and very informative.
title: Peaceful yet modern villa

text:
This place is excellent for couples to have honeymoon or romantic vacation.
The villa was great, clean, and comfortable.
The staffs were very friendly and helpful.

The food is average, but I like the fruit pudding. 

The location is not really good, because if you don't know the area well (or it's your first time to go to Seminyak area), you will be a little bit confused. It's also pretty far from downtown.
And it's quite difficult to get parking area in here.
title: Extraordinaire

text: Been there for 3N 4D. Room is really spacious, romantic and very clean with small kitchen and comfy living room. The housekeeping really did they job good and quite fast. The location is really good, since it's quite secluded yet still close with center of seminyak. We never regret booking this place since we could get want we want the most.. quiet, romantic, spacious and very clean. Couldn't wait to come to this place again.
title: Amazing

text:
The Good: 
The staff at The Seiryu are very attentive, friendly and helpful. I have to give them a pat on the back for all they have done to make our stay a pleasant one. The villa is spacious and nice; we stayed in the Autumn theme one and we really love all the Japanese art and decor. Breakfast spread is awesome! The bed is really comfortable as well. :)

The Bad:
Our free dinner that came with the honeymoon package was pretty bad. I was quite unhappy with my main course as the fish was not cooked properly. They re-cooked the fish again but it ended up really dry and just blah. It would have been better if they could replace my main course. Also the hair dryer in the bedroom is disgusting! I'm sorry but it really is! It's time you guys change the hair dryer, cause it is sticky, moldy and have some hair from previous use on it. This is unacceptable. And for some reason, there's a smell coming from the drainage hole in the standing shower and it stinks real bad (it stinks even more when all the doors in the bathroom are closed and there's completely no ventilation coming in).

Personally overall I really like the service coming from the staff, the villa is pretty but there's a lot of maintainence work that needs to be done.
title: Can do better!

owner_response.text:
Dear our valued customers,

Firstly let me take this opportunity to thank you personally for your trust towards The Seiryu Villas during your recent visit to Bali, and to write about your holiday experience. Please be advised that your comment are very encouraging and will have immediate follow up for our improvement.

We do believe that our staff in charge was trying to help and find an alternative solution however if the way of solving the problem was disappointing you, again please accept our deepest apology.

Once again, thank you for your review.


Sincerely your,

Ketut Sukanada
E-commerce Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We and another couple stayed in two Seiryu villages next to each other. 
The best part on that holiday was the friendliness and helpfulness of the Seiryu staff. They even made a Birthday cake as they noticed that we celebrated one birthday there. This was very unexpected and a pleasant surprise. So 5 stars for the staff!
But the village itself was not what we expected in Bali. 
The entrance to the villages is a dark and unfriendly hallway, not the airy flower garden we knew from previous Bali visits. There is no out-door kitchen, but a functional kitchen tucked away at the back of the living area with no view to the outside. Breakfast is served in there. After a couple of day we asked the staff if we could have breakfast served in the front garden and they supplied us with a table there. That was a lot more enjoyable.
The Villages are decorated more in a Japanese style so only cushions on the floor to sit on in the living and outdoor area which can get very uncomfortable when you have a back problem. A huge outside day bed was the best place to enjoy the villages.
As there is no common pool or common area in the villas, but only a couple of benches in the reception area, you are restricted to your villa.
Also the location was on a smelly road with open sewer to both sides so the walk to the shops was not really pleasant.
The beach is only a short stroll away and the Seiryu is supposed to have umbrellas and lounge chairs on the beach for their guests. After 2 days of searching for them, the staff took us to the beach showing us the Seiryu Umbrella. Yes, it was only one umbrella and two chairs for all guests and they were taken. The friendly staff managed to get 4 extra chairs for our group and we could use them in the shade of the trees. But we were refused the use of the bathrooms on the beach as the Seiryu is not one of the hotels included in this service. When complaining about this to the staff they offered us afternoon tea which was delicious.
Free Wi-Fi service was provided which was slow but working so no complains about this one. The service also included only a free pickup from the airport to the villages, but the return trip to the airport was not included and we were quoted $15US from the Seiryu to take us. We decided to take a taxi which cost us only 57000 Rupies. ($6-7US)
All in all we would say that the staff made our holiday memorable but because of all the other problems we will not go back there.
title: not so sure

photos.caption: the extra outside table, that made all the difference
The connecting hall way (Entrance to the villas)

text:
Wow - what can I say?
The staff were amazing, the villa was amazing, the food was amazing...
From the moment I stepped off my Singapore Airlines flight and was greeted by the driver (with chilled water and towelette) to the moment I left, nothing was too much trouble for the Seiryu team.  They also put up with my dreadfully rusty Bahasa (though all spoke English perfectly).
I bought a package deal that included breakfast (your choice from a number of options).
The bedroom (and bed) was huge, the loungeroom was enormous, cavernous kitchen...  
Beautiful sun bed, lap pool, outdoor shower, wifi connection, excellent air conditioning.
And the little touches like the staff daily popping in and lighting the oil burners (and the smell of it wafting down the walkway) helped to enhance my star and make it one to remember.  
After an absence of 21 years, my return to Bali couldn't have been any more sublime.
title: Utterly divine

text:
We are writing this review on the 4th and final night of our very pleasurable stay in Seiryu Villas. 

HIS VIEW:
Above all, the Seiryu is a great place for couples that want privacy, and we need to stress on “privacy” as the operative word. The Seiryu, with just 8 villas, is built from the ground up to give occupants complete privacy – from the high walls and sense of isolation within each villa enclosure, to the absence of shared or common areas and facilities. For eg, there is no common pool nor breakfast area.

The little pool, about 10m in length, is too small to swim but great for just soaking. The high walls of the villa means that the pool area gets the sun between 10am – 4pm. 

The villas are clean and spacious (separate kitchen, bedroom, living area, bathroom, and pool area) and well furnished with 2 sets of LCD TVs and DVD players, an iPod speaker, WiFi broadband (albeit a little slow), and even a Jacuzzi.

I was disappointed that there isn’t a gym in the private villas, but you can do your runs at the beach. 

The service staff was friendly, attentive and helpful. They are obliging and responsive whenever you make requests. For example, when our WiFi was down temporarily, the technician arrived within 3 mins and the problem was solved within 20 mins.

Having breakfast served in your own villa was a nice treat. We were satisfied with the quality and quantity of the food served (you are given a choice of Local, American or Continental). It’s worth noting that my wife and I are not big eaters, so those of you expecting big buffet spreads will need to manage your expectations.

The location is actually quite good – once you familiarize yourself with the surroundings. The Seiryu is located about 200m inside a narrow lane called Jalan Drupida. When we first arrived at 9pm, we were a little worried about the dimly lit lane but felt a lot more comfortable once we got our bearings the following day. 

Jalan Drupida is equidistant from the beach (5-min brisk walk) and the main tourist road called Jalan Seminyak. For those that fancy lazing on the beach itself, the Seiryu owns several lounge chairs on the beach for its guests, and provides a free shuttle service if you don’t feel like walking there.

There are many good restaurants within 10-15 mins taxi ride from the hotel. Warung Made, along Jalan Seminyak, serves great local fare (try their sate or mee goring). Chandi and Cafe Jemme are definitely worth visiting, but are relatively pricey. Be sure to make reservations beforehand so you’ll not be disappointed. 

Her view:
The walls are high, but well- disguised by plants, gently caressed by the light breeze. The running poolside waterfall lends an air of tranquility to the scorching day. We only have the cloudless blue sky overhead witnessing our day.  We soon forgot about our initial claustrophobic state of imprisonment and started to be free in our newly acquired absolute privacy.

This holiday follows our idlyllic stay two weeks ago at the banyan tree resorts in lijiang. Because we experienced unparalleled  5star treatment there, anything would have paled in comparison.  While I didn’t expect the banyantree here, I didn’t expect that The Seiryu (at USD250 a night) would offer frayed bath and hand towels and pillow cases, nor discoloured steel pipes in the shower nor holes in the bed curtains.  I also didn’t particularly take to the plastic orchids and lilies.

However, there were plus points which made us both happy enough. The evening turn down service ensured that the room was made up, towels changed for a second time each day. The breakfast service was set up on time at our dining table. The butler service was always just a phonecall away – wireless not working, make reservation for us, call a taxi for us. Always with a smile.

And even though we didn’t awake to the view of the rolling seas (ala Oberoi, or Anantara), The Seiryu Villa offered us a comfortable compromise – we found this balance when we sat on our reserved deck chairs on the black beach watching the surf.
title: A great villa for couples that want privacy

text:
Beautiful Seiryu Villas... my partner and I spent a week here and absolutely loved it. We will be back!

The villas are so comfortable and lovely we could barely motivate ourselves to leave the villas during the day! Everything was just like the pics - the villa itself was beautiful. It was perfect to roll out of bed in the morning onto the sun deck, then roll right into the pool when you started feeling hot! The place was wonderfully quiet and peaceful. Daily breakfasts were great - a choice of Japanese, Balinese, Western or Healthy. Always perfectly prepared in the kitchen with minimal fuss and intrusion... just a knock on the door kitchen door. The staff were impeccable - amazingly nice, always with a smile on their face and happy to help with anything.

The Villas are located on a small side street, about 5 mins walk to the beach, 15 mins walk the other direction to one of the main Seminyak shopping strips. There are heaps of cafes and restaurants nearby so you won't go hungry. There is a little massage place right next door, called Vitamin, which was perfect to pop out for a 1 or 2 hour massage. The villas offer a free shuttle to Seminyak or Kuda twice a day. We used it once to go to Kuda to wander around the markets and we just caught a taxi back... very easy. 

On our last day we flew out at about 11pm so they arranged for us to go to the "beach club" which basically means they have the beach chairs and umbrellas, and offer drinks and a picnic lunch basket if you want it. We spent a nice day chilling on the beach... although think we were spoilt with the seclusion of the villas for the week because I found myself wishing we were back in the villa! Nothing is too difficult - we wanted to shower before we headed off to the airport so used a villa to freshen up before they shuttled us off.

The villas have a pretty big selection of DVDs so you can just ask at the front desk and they'll bring out a few books of DVD's. We didn't bring our laptop (what a luxury!) but we connected to wifi for our phones with no issues. 

Thanks for a wonderful stay - we'll be recommending this place to all our friends!
title: Everything you need

text:
My husband and I stayed for 14 nights at this beautiful place. We had high expectations and were not disappointed.

The villas look beautiful on pictures and are even more stunning in real life. We stayed in one of the larger pool villas (I believe it was B2) and had a huge combined living room/kitchen/dining room, a separate bedroom and an indoor jacuzzi in the bathroom with direct access to the outdoor pool was much larger than an ordinary plunge pool. On the large wooden terrace we enjoyed the sun during the day and we even had a beautiful outdoor candlelight dinner set up on our last night. 

There are 8 adjoined villas separated by high walls so you are guaranteed absolute privacy. The concept is a mix between a private villa and a resort - you have the privacy of a private villa but also the benefits of a hotel with daily cleaning, breakfast, front desk, limo service and even a laptop with internet access. There are no common areas such as restaurant/bar or main pool but we didn’t miss it either.

Breakfast is served in your villa and you can chose between different themes such as Indonesian, American or Japanese. You make your choice the night before and also decide what time you want breakfast served which can be a little impractical if you don’t know what time you think you are gonna wake up. You can also order room service but allow up to 1 hour before serving - or try out restaurant Delicious Onion almost next door where they serve good food at very reasonable prices. Also don’t miss tapas at the Spanish restaurant further up the road (if you go at night, bring a torch as the road is pitch black).

There have been mentioned location issues in some of the other reviews and yes, the villas are not located in the heart of Seminyak, but on a quiet side road to the main road. However, if you want to go out for lunch/dinner there are several restaurants in the close neighbourhood and if you want to go to the "Eat street" in Seminyak city centre it's gonna take about 30 min by foot. On the plus side The Seiryu is located fairly close to the beach – only 5-10 min. walk. 

The staff was real friendly and made you feel welcome at all times. I can only warmly recommend a stay at The Seiryu.
title: Beautiful Seiryu

text: I would recommend these Villas as these were of very high standards and would have no problem staying again. The Villa were spotless, the staff were very approachable and more than helpful. I found the Villa very spacious and they were well located. The rooms were very comfortable with nice furnisings.
title: My stay in The Seiryu Villas Bali.

text:
Great place to stay, pools are alittle small - but otherwise very high spec tech, in room nice touch bed room tv ( flat screen)
Love the food served at breakfast in the private dininng room of your villia.

Parkings a bit iffy - really a must for bali, loved the place wish they would not advertise prices in room in us $.
title: Very nice

text: It is very well comfort stay at this villa with well decorated and privacy as concern. It is also not far from beach and town either with taxi or some walking distance. Expected the breakfast able to improve a bit to make it more perfect.
title: Well comfort peaceful stay

text: We stayed at the hotel for 2 nights after moving out from a horrendous one which I shall not mention here.  The Seiryu is a nice villa with japanese architecture and is thoughtfully planned out througout.  We would certainly return here the next time we are in Bali.  One problem was the difficulty of pronoucing its name to the taxis we took from various parts of seminyak and kuta
title: Seiryu

text: In late June 2009, we stayed one night at the Seiyu in Seminyak in one of their private villas, which had its own pool. The decor was tastefully done: contemporary Japanese with a small rock garden in the villa space. Overall, I loved the place and overall experience. We had a lot of privacy. The room itself was roomy with very high ceilings. The bathroom exited into the private pool, which also had a curtained acove on the other side. Simply beautiful.
title: Seiyu Review

text:
My wife and I stayed at the Seiryu Villas in Seminyak Bali for our honeymoon for 6 nights.
The saddest part of the trip was checking out. We had such an amazing time at the Villas. It really made our honeymoon experience much much more enjoyable.

The Villa is located in the Seminyak area of Bali. Perfect location for honeymooners and for those who want to get away from the hustle and bustle of Kuta. This is a popular location to stay for most newly weds as there are many nice restaurants, boutiques, shops, etc around the area within walking distance. The nearest beach (Seminyak Beach) is no more than a 10 min walk away. The beauty of its location is that everything is in easy reach, eg (K Mart, 24 hour convenience store = 5 mins walk) or (Beauty Spa Salons/Hairdressers = 10 min walk). Also when in the villa it is extremely quiet and peaceful, day or night.

A little bit about the hotel location in regards to the nearest beach as I know this was a concern for me when I was researching where to book. I did alot of research looking for the right villa in the right location before I booked this one. My concern was that it was going to be too far from the beach and that we would have to take a taxi there everytime. Although the villa is not right on the beach it is easy to walk to and because we had a private pool, we did not want go to the beach everyday. Furthermore there are several beaches around Bali in different areas therefore it is not neccasary to go for a beach villa as you will want to visit them all.

On our arrival to Bali, the airport immigration took over 2 hours. I believe the seiryu villas offer an express airport service for a small fee where by they can get things moving much quicker at the airport. We did not take this option as we didnt think it would take as long as it did however we will next time we go back. Furthermore, even though it took so long at the airport, our driver was still waiting outside who greeted us and gave us fresh cold towels and a bottle of water. Just what you need to cool you down.

Upon arrival to the Seiryu, all the staff one by one greeted us and introduced themselves to us. Before you even get into the reception area, you cant help but notice the fine attention to detail on almost everything. If you appreciate interior decore and contemporary designs then you will love The Seiryu. We also received a welcome drink each on arrival.

We stayed in Villa B4. The villa was apsolutely stunning, mind blowing and very spacious. The villa was specially decorated for us as we selected the honeymoon package which included candles lit inside and out, flower petals in the bath tub and on our extra large king size bed plus a honeymoon cake. We had our own private pool which was amazing, a day bed, deck chairs and a garden shower. (Without sounding too corny, it was really romantic taking a shower with the stars and moon light above) It made us not want to leave our villa. The living room was very spacious with a large sofa and flat screen tv and dvd. The kitchen had everything you need to make a nice home cooked meal. The bathroom had a large jacuzzi bath tub and shower with many amenities including a safe for your valuables.

As part of the honeymoon package we also received 1x spa session at a very upscale place and candle lit dinner in the privacy of our own garden. The villa does not have their own restaurant therefore the breakfast was delivered to our room each morning. We had a choice of American, Continental, Japanese/Chinese and Indonesian breakfast. Note for vegitarian food we did struggle a  little in Bali.

In regards to the service we received at the Seiryu Villas, it was second to none. We really felt like VIP guests at the Seiryu. Anything we asked for was delivered within minutes and the hotel staff went out their way to make sure we had everything we need. The staff were all genuine, polite and friendly. I think as a whole, people in Bali are very polite and respectful of each other. Even when we checked out all the staff came out side to say fare-well.

The area is very safe even if your walking down a quiet road in the early hours of the morning. Near by there are several bars/clubs one of which called Ku De Ta which was the number 1 club in the area. There is a restaurant next door to the hotel called Sorriso which served excellent Italian food. Also we hired a scooter while we were out in Bali and never having driven one before, I got the hang of it quite easily. It is fairly safe to drive around Bali although the blue taxi's are very cheap if your not so confident driving in another country.

Overall we would rate The Seiryu Villas as a 5 star. * * * * *
I have promised my wife we would go back in a few years as we had such an amazing time in Bali and I would not stay anywhere else other than The Seiryu Villas.
We recomend it to everyone and were very very happy with our stay.

Happy Honeymoon!

Divyan & Vayshalie
title: Can only be described as paradise!

text: We loved the privacy of our huge villa with private pool and garden. Every morning you could just jump into the pool and have a swim before the staff would prepare the breakfast in the kitchen. The rooms were very stylish and comfy. The beach is just a 5 min walk away and that particular part of the beach was a lot less crowded than further down to Kuta. There is a nice surf and you can rent umbrellas und chairs at the beach. There are many surf instructors out there if you ever wanted to learn surfing.
title: Wow - fantastic

text: Very nice villas, every area is well decorated and well equipped.  The bathroom had both a large rain shower and a Jacuzzi bathtub. The bedroom and living room both had a LCD TV and dvd player, the hotel also has a selection of dvds available at reception but the choice isn't great.  The food was fairly average, and they stop serving after 1030pm, which is a bit early.  The staff were extremely friendly although there was a lack of information provided about what to do/see in Bali.  You can walk to some restaurants and shops but most require a short Taxi ride.
title: Very nice villas, average food

text: The Seiryu Villas are Japanese inspired, providing comfort, privacy and security to exceptional standards. The bed here was the most comfortable of our trip. Seminyak for us was a great base for dining in local restaurants (Italian next door very good if you looking for some variety)and exploring the local area (Shops, Kuta and the beach) both on foot and by motorcycle. The Seiryu staff were absolutely attentive without being invasive. I highly recommend these villas and will be forever grateful to the staff who with no expectation drove to the airport to return my phone! Thank you again!
title: highly recommended

text:
Me and my partner only managed to stay at this beautiful place for only a night as we spent the other nights in Ubud. The design is simplistic and contemporary. You get the sense of space. If you want peace and quiet, this is definitely the place. Sometimes, it feels too quiet! I would have liked the place to be more decorated, adding more touches of coziness. However, for the price we paid...it was deifinitely a steal! I love the jacuzzi tub, the separate shower and toilet...and you can leap into the pool via the toilet door! The sofa was also huge and comfy! And if you love LCD TVs, there are 2, one 42 inch one at the living room and a 32 inch one in the bedroom! I am not so keen on the room though, like i mentioned above...too spacey. However, this is a japanese contemporary themed room, hence I can't expect it to be any different. 
The location, although far from the 'main' area, it is pretty good! Taxis are cheap and trust me you don't want to stay at the main 'one way streets' of Bali! It is nosiy with car honks and dusty from the congested roads! Trust me, the Bali people love their honks! Plus, if you stay at these hotels located at the main areas, it will take you a long time to get out of that street due to the heavy traffic. Have your dinner at Chandi! A street behind Jln Drupadi where Seriyu is located. The crabmeat dumplings are to die for! I can't say much for their service though.
Yes, they do have DVDs, but I have a comment on their selection though. I wanted to borrow The Wedding Singer, but they were out, instead this girl recommended me this show call XXY! The show although good, but it was not something I wanted to watch during my romantic stay at this Villa. It totally drained the mood for both me and my partner. We were left disturbed. I guess we could have stopped the show halfway and choose another...but i guess that was what happened. 
Breakfast was abundant although they do not have their own restaurant. In fact doesn't have much, thus, it is either your villa or you have to be out there in Bali. 
In short, stay at this place if you get a good rate. Email directly to the hotel. I enjoyed my stay here and will definitely come back!
title: Spectacular!

text:
Gute Lage. Man erreicht in 5 Minuten den tollen Strand und ist auch zu Fuß direkt im belebten Teil mit vielen Geschäften, Restaurants und SPAs.
Die Villen mit eigenem Pool bieten in all dem Trubel totale Ruhe und Intimität. 
Alles sehr sauber. Das Personal immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. 
Die Unterkunft hat kein Restaurant. Frühstück muss im Zimmer vorbestellt werden und wir in der Villa eingenommen. Die war uns zu trist. Zudem kann man in der Umgebung in vielen Lokalen super Frühstücken (z.B. im Dustys).

Fazit: für Paare ein super Unterkunft
title: Ruhe im Trubel- super!

owner_response.text:
Sehr Geehrte Frau. Diehsle,

Vielen Dank für Ihr Feedback, das wir sehr schätzen. Es ist uns eine Freude, Sie bei uns in der Seiryu Boutique Villa Seminyak begrüßen zu dürfen, und wir freuen uns, dass Sie wundervolle Erfahrungen gemacht haben. Wir sind bestrebt, die Erwartungen unserer Gäste zu übertreffen, und bemühen uns stets, unseren Gästen ein unvergessliches Erlebnis zu bieten. Ich möchte mich für Ihr Kompliment an unseren exzellenten Service bedanken und das Personal ist sehr freundlich zu Ihnen. Mit Ihrem positiven Feedback wird unser Team sicherlich motiviert sein, die Interaktionen der Gäste weiter zu verbessern. Wir freuen uns, Sie im nächsten Urlaub wieder begrüßen zu dürfen.


Freundliche Grüße,

Jefri

text: Wir verbringen gerade 2 Wochen in Seminyak und haben eine der Seiryu Villen gebucht. Die Villa liegt an einer Nebenstrasse ca. 10 Minuten Gehweg vom Strand entfernt oder auch in unmittelbarer Nähe zu vielen Restaurants. Die Villa hat einen kleinen Innenhof mit Pool den man nicht einsehen kann. Weiter ein grosses Wohnschlafzimmer und eine Küche. Vom Bad aus hat man ebenfalls Zugang zum Pool. Das Frühstück wird in die Villa serviert, da es keinen Frühstücksraum gibt. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Alles ist gepflegt und sauber. Vereinzelt sind gewisse Sachen, wie das Holz der Türen, vom Klima etwas angegriffen, aber das stört nicht, ausser man wäre Perfektionist. Wer also die Ruhe sucht und trotzdem Unterhaltung in nächster Nähe geniesst ist hier richtig.

text:
Ich war mit meinem Freund während zwei Wochen im "The Seiryu Villas" (4B Royal Pool Villa). Es war ein herrlicher Aufenthalt, genau das richtige für Paare!

Villa: Sehr grosse Unterkunft mit wunderschönem privaten Pool im abgetrennten Garten. Es fehlte an nichts bei der Ausstattung. 2 TVs, 3 Klimaanlagen, anständiges Kingsize Bett, grosses Sofa, grosse Küche, WiFi, Outdoordusche, Badewanne, genügend Handtücher, Bade-Mantel,... alles was ein 5 Sterne Hotel bitet! Wir fühlten uns wie Zuhause!
Das Hotel bietet sehr viel Privatsfähre. Ohne den Handwerker auf dem Dach, der herum lief, wäre es zu 100% erfüllt gewesen.

Service: Das Personal war sehr höflich und hilfsbereit! Sie waren sehr bemüht unsere Bedürfnisse zu erfüllen. Ein kleines Manko bei der Genauigkeit. Beispiel beim Frühstück. Täglich bestellte man am Vortag das Frühstück aus der Auswahl. Jedesmal fehlte aber eine Kleinigkeit. Ob es das Brot, frische Früchte oder Milch für den Kaffee war... Die ersten paar Male verzeiht man es gerne, aber nach 14 Tagen kann das etwas nerven.
Anderes Beispiel. Auch wurde das Zimmer für die Nacht (Vorhänge ziehen, Bett vorbereiten,...) nur manchmal erledigt.
Leider nimmt man das nicht so genau in Bezug auf die Genauigkeit&Proffesionalität.

Sauberkeit: Täglich wurde unsere Villa gründlich gereinigt! Das Housekeeping Personal (für am Morgen) waren zu Dritt, höflich, zurückhaltend und schnell. Es gibt in diesem Hotel kein lästiges Housekeeping, das einfach reinplatzt oder an der Türe klopft, weil sie die Arbeit erledigen müssen. Sie kommen, sobald wir ausser Haus sind oder auf Wunsch... egal um welche Uhrzeit! Echt angenehm!
Badetücher riechen übrigens herrlich! 

Standort: Das Hotel liegt ideal. 5 Min. bis zum Strand, zentral in Seminyak und trotzdem weg vom ganzen Rummel. Bei der Anreise war das Hotel schwierig zu finden. Denn von Aussen ist der Name viel zu klein angeschrieben. Aber das gilt ja nur für die Anreise.

Kleiner Tipp: Alle Ausflüge, Taxi, Motorbike,... kann über die Rezeption gebucht werden. Es werden keine Extrakosten verrechnet und sie erledigen alles proffesionell!

Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt im Seiryu, besonders die Villa war toll! Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen!
title: Perfekte Villa für Paar

text:
Wir hatten eine private Villa für 2 Wochen gebucht. Man hat einen eigenen Pool- eigene Küche mit Hintereingang für das Personal. Der Garten mit dem Pool ist völlig unseinsichtig- man kann sich somit frei bewegen. Das Reinigungspersonal kommt immer erst wenn man die Villa verlässt - sie sind sehr gründlich und äußerst bemüht. 
Jeden Morgen bringt das Personal das Frühstück ( man wählt am Abend vorher aus was man wann möchte ) ins Esszimmer. Man steht auf wenn die Kellner weg sind und das Frühstück ist fertig...herrlich :-)!!!!! Die Ausstattung der Villen lässt an nichts zu Wünschen übrig - 2 Fernseher, wudnerschöner Holzboden, tolles Badezimmer - wir konnten vom Badezimmer aus gleich direkt in den Pool gehen...!!! 
Vor den Villen ist immer Wachpersonal - es kann also nichts passieren.
Wir können diese Villen uneingeschränkt weiterempfeheln
title: wunderschöne private villas

text: Accueil parfait , jolie piscine , toujours à l'écoute , villa spacieuse mais un peu vieillot quand même  , petit déjeuner très bon mais pas Bcp de choix  , à 10mn à pied de la plage et un peu excentré du centre. Heureusement que les taxis ne coûtent pas grand chose , comptez 2€ pour rejoindre le centre .  Ne vaut pas 5 étoiles !!

text:
Nous avons séjourné dans cet hôtel du 1er au 7 septembre 2013.
Tout était parfait!
Dès notre arrivée nous avons était parfaitement accueilli pour une équipe à l'écoute et souriante.
La villa était incroyable, belle entrée avec petit jardin et belle piscine privée. A l'intérieur un magnifique salon avec cuisine ouverte et une hauteur à couper le souffle!!
La chambre était top avec un lit KING size, des rangements pratiques et écran plat.
La salle de bain est top avec douche et baignoire jacuzzi ouverte sur la piscine, quel bonheur!!
Le service était parfait, la grande classe!!
La plage se trouve à 5min à pied avec transats et parasols.
L'hôtel est très bien placé!!

Merci à toute l'équipe pour ce fabuleux séjour!!

A très vite

Paul et Océane
title: Parfait et magique!

text:
Il s'agit d'un hotel-villa avec 6 à 8 villas dans un style japonais. une fois dans sa villa on n'a pas l'impression d'avoir de voisins.Les villas sont petites mais tres bien agencées. Petit dejeuner très bon servi dans la villa. La localisation est tres bonne à 5 minutes a pied de la plage en arrivant au niveau du gado-gado.Endroit tres calme. Le spa etait cher pour des criteres balinais donc on a pas essayé. on est resté 2 semaines et ils nous ont spontanement offert un dejeuner dans la villa et la nourriture etait très bonne.
on a eu notre villa à 200 doll la nuit par agoda ce qui correspond au juste prix. les prix affichés a l'hotel me semble trop élevés par rapport aux autres locations de villa sur seminyak.
title: tres bien situé

text: Superbe villa avec un personnel très agréable et très dispo. La villa est tout simplement magnifique avec son petit coin cuisine, une chambre spacieuse avec sa déco moderne et japonaise et la piscine privée. Nous nous sentons vraiment chez nous comme a la maison. havre de paix de tranquillité à l'abri des regards. Mon mari et moi avons passés un excellent séjour et une seconde lune de miel. Parfait pour les amoureux comme nous qui se retrouveront dans l'intimité. le petit déjeuner est servi tout les jours dans notre le villa à nos goût et selon nos envies. tout les matins nous avons déjeuner dans notre villa. On avaient plus qu'à mettre les pieds sous la table! Je recommande vivement cette villa un peu excentrée du centre ville mais a ses avantages et inconvénient
title: La vie de rêve

text:
2012년 여름에 와이프와 4일을 머물렀습니다.
모던한 로비와 실내 모두 마음에 들었으며, 스탭도 모두 친절했습니다.

실내 :
  공간이 여유있기도 하지만, 구성도 훌륭합니다. 
  부엌과 침실 사이에 에 문이 있어 스탭이 잠을 깨우지 않고 아침을 준비해줄 수 있습니다.
  욕실이 풀과 바로 연결되어 풀을 즐긴 후 바로 샤워할 수 있는 등 실용적입니다.
실외 :
  욕실과 바로 이어진 풀이 긴 직사각형 모양으로 되어있어서  넓게 즐길 수 있고
  선베드와 야외침대도 편안하고 로맨틱했습니다.
  또한 아름다운 꽃이 맺혀있는 나무가 정원에 있어서 매우 운치있고 이국적입니다.
위치 :
  스미냑 중심가와 해변 모두 걸어서 다닐 수 있는 좋은 위치입니다. 
  다만, 빌라 근처에 큰 공사를 하고 있어서 길이 조금 불편한 점이 아쉬더군요.
음식 :
  일본 스타일의 빌라답게 조식이 매우 깔끔하고 정갈하게 준비됩니다.
  더구나 식사를 선택할 수 있는 폭이 매우 넓습니다! (쥬스 하나까지 선택 가능합니다)
  다만 맛은 평이한 편이라서 굳이 점심이나 저녁까지 먹고 싶지는 않았네요.
title: 깔끔. 친절. 모던. 프라이빗.

text:
superbes villas en plein coeur de Seminyak, emplacement parfait tout pres des restaurants, de la plage et des boutiques !
juste a coté de l'hotel se trouve un spa Vitamin, tres bon rapport qualité/prix massage balinais 1 h environ 13 euros

les villas sont tres bien agencées et decoration contemporaine épurée superbe

le personnel du Seiruy est adorable , souriant , toujours  a nos petits soins 

on a l'impression d'etre les seuls clients, on ne voit  ni entend jamais les autres clients de l'hotel 

ils ont un "beach club" sur la plage de Seminyak , tous les matins on avait notre parasol et nos transats  avec serviettes qui nous attendaient !

le matin votre petit dejeuner est apporté dans la salle à manger de la villa à l'heure souhaitée.

les moins : la cuisine est mal équipée si on veut par hasard se faire un repas soit meme (pas d'assiettes, peu d'ustensiles, juste des feux de cuisson)

                   wifi un peu capricieux, certains moments il marche bien a d'autres c'est un enfer !!!!

                  pour le dernier jour, nous n'avons pas pu garder la villa jusqu'a l'heure du départ et ils ne sont pas équipés d'une douche accessible aux clients de l'hotel sur le départ. Finalement ils nous ont proposé de nous emmener dans un autre hotel partenaire afin que nous puissions nous doucher et nous changer avant le long retour sur la France

monsieur le directeur du Seiryu prevoir une douche nous semble important et serait plus simple pour vos clients qui ont leurs vols en fin de journee et le soir 

nous esperons revenir l'an prochain passer quelques jours avec toute l'équipe
title: un havre de paix au coeur de Seminyak

photos.caption: vue d'ensemble exteireur de notre villa

text:
Se trata de unas villas, en concreto 8 villas con un muy buen servicio. Las villas son de concepto ZEN japonés...bueno o lo intentan. Lo mejor el servicio...lo peor las horas de sol  y lo mal que va la WIFI.
La zona donde estan ubicadas obligan al transporte ya sea privado(alquiler moto, tienen parking, para coche no hay parking) o público(taxi). Está cerca de la playa a escaso 5 minutos a pie. Las horas de sol son escasas, lo normal es levantarte sobre las 8.00 am , esperar el desayuno, una vez almuerzas...necesitas aire fresco mientras se hace la digestión...sales hasta las 11...y claro tienes 3 horas de sol, porque a las 16 se acabó...los muros que separan las villas son muy altos...y no dejan pasar la luz...por lo tanto tienes que ir a la playa...ellos son conscientes y tienen una zona privada con amacas en la playa...solo que está justo delante de un bar cool de ambiente cubano...que parece que estas más en Varadero que no en Bali. Lo mejor es la zona de Ku De Ta. Mi nota es de 6,5 sobre 10...en estos momentos considero que es mejor probar otro tipo de villas mas económicas por las horas de sol que tienes. Recomiendo por zona, espacio y aunque peor servicio Bvilla.
title: Ajustado

text: In questo hotel ho pernottato purtroppo per una sola notte e devo dire che ora, a posteri, vi trascorrerei almeno 4-5 notti...ti sembra di essere davvero in una favola...anche cercandolo non riesco a trovare un solo difetto...la gentilezza del personale, la "camera" che più che una camera è una vera e propria casa...piscina privata, materassi per prendere il sole, ombrelloni, gazebo, salottino con TV LCD, camera open space, cucina, bagno con vasca idromassaggio, insomma un paradiso...il prezzo, se paragonato a tutti i servizi offerti è più che onesto. Sicuramente tornerò a trascorrere più di una notte in questo magnifico albergo!
title: Hotel da favola

text: 整个酒店一共才8间别墅，我住的是豪华别墅，有客厅、卧室、卫生间干湿分离，浴缸旁边有门直接通向私人泳池，泳池有点小，泳池旁边是小花园，还有厨房，价格有点高，但是私密性非常好，服务也非常好。
title: 服务至上的别墅

text: 日本をイメージした内装はかなりすばらしかったです。また、庭にはプライベートプールがあり、またベッドまであり、ゆっくりステイするにはとてもよいところかと思います。
title: 日本的デザインホテル

text: 신혼여행으로 다녀온 Seiryu, 기대이상으로 너무나도 좋았습니다. 모든 직원들이 다 친절하고, 음식도 맛있고 깔끔하고 위치도 좋고, 적극 추천합니다.
title: My fantastic honeymoon

text: 우선 호텔 내부의 인테리어가 일본식 ZEN스타일인것이 맘에 들었고 모던하고 깔끔한 분위기에서 내내 지낼 수 있었음이 좋았다. 아침식사나 그외 편의 시설도 깔끔하고 정갈한 느낌이라 추천할만 하며 스미냑고거리가 멀지않아 좋다.
title: 깔끔한 ZEN스타일의 호텔
